10390858Di2015UniqueSeparator static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (MemoryMappedFile mmf = MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew("testmap", 4000))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bool mutexCreated;Di2015NewLine                Mutex mutex = new Mutex(true, "testmapmutex", out mutexCreated);Di2015NewLine                using (MemoryMappedViewStream stream = mmf.CreateViewStream())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    BinaryWriter writer = new BinaryWriter(stream);Di2015NewLine                    string st = "Hellow";Di2015NewLine                    int stringSize = Encoding.UTF8.GetByteCount(st); //6Di2015NewLine                    writer.Write(st);Di2015NewLine                    writer.Write(123); //6+4 bytes = 10 bytesDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                mutex.ReleaseMutex();Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Start Process B and press ENTER to continue.");Di2015NewLine                Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                mutex.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine                using (MemoryMappedViewStream stream = mmf.CreateViewStream())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    BinaryReader reader = new BinaryReader(stream);Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Process  A  says: {0}", reader.ReadString());Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Process  A says: {0}", reader.ReadInt32());Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Process  B says: {0}", reader.ReadInt32());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                mutex.ReleaseMutex();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

10392909Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar input = ".* AND [0-9]+ AND abc OR (abc AND def)";Di2015NewLinevar rpn = ParseRPN(input);  Di2015NewLinevar test = GetExpression(new Queue<string>(rpn.Reverse())).Compile();Di2015NewLinetest("abc");    // falseDi2015NewLinetest("abc0");   // trueDi2015NewLinetest("abcdef"); // trueDi2015NewLine
10392909Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Queue<string> ParseRPN(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // improve the parsing into tokens hereDi2015NewLine    var output = new Queue<string>();Di2015NewLine    var ops = new Stack<string>();Di2015NewLine    input = input.Replace("(","( ").Replace(")"," )");Di2015NewLine    var split = input.Split(' ');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var token in split)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (token == "AND" || token == "OR")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (ops.Count > 0 && (ops.Peek() == "AND" || ops.Peek() == "OR"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                output.Enqueue(ops.Pop());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            ops.Push(token);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (token == "(") ops.Push(token);Di2015NewLine        else if (token == ")")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (ops.Count > 0 && ops.Peek() != "(")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                output.Enqueue(ops.Pop());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            ops.Pop();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else output.Enqueue(token); // it's a number        Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (ops.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        output.Enqueue(ops.Pop());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return output;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10392909Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetExpression
10392909Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Expression<Func<string,bool>> GetExpression(Queue<string> input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var exp = input.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine    if (exp == "AND") return GetExpression(input).And(GetExpression(input));Di2015NewLine    else if (exp == "OR") return GetExpression(input).Or(GetExpression(input));Di2015NewLine    else return (test => Regex.IsMatch(test, exp));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10392909Di2015UniqueSeparatorPredicateBuilder
10392909Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class PredicateBuilderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> True<T> ()  { return f => true;  }Di2015NewLine  public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> False<T> () { return f => false; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> Or<T> (this Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr1,Di2015NewLine                                                      Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr2)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var invokedExpr = Expression.Invoke (expr2, expr1.Parameters.Cast<Expression> ());Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>Di2015NewLine          (Expression.OrElse (expr1.Body, invokedExpr), expr1.Parameters);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> And<T> (this Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr1,Di2015NewLine                                                       Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr2)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var invokedExpr = Expression.Invoke (expr2, expr1.Parameters.Cast<Expression> ());Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>Di2015NewLine          (Expression.AndAlso (expr1.Body, invokedExpr), expr1.Parameters);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10398468Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static bool _IsUserAuthorized(HtmlHelper htmlHelper,Di2015NewLine  string controllerName, string actionName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  ControllerContext controllerContext = null;Di2015NewLine  //if controllerName is null or empty, we'll use the Di2015NewLine  // current controller in HtmlHelper.ViewContext.Di2015NewLine  if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(controllerName))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    controllerContext = htmlHelper.ViewContext.Controller.ControllerContext;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  else //use the controller factory to get the requested controllerDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var factory = ControllerBuilder.Current.GetControllerFactory();Di2015NewLine    ControllerBase controller = (ControllerBase)factory.CreateController(Di2015NewLine      htmlHelper.ViewContext.RequestContext, controllerName);Di2015NewLine    controllerContext = new ControllerContext(Di2015NewLine      htmlHelper.ViewContext.RequestContext, controller);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Type controllerType = controllerContext.Controller.GetType();Di2015NewLine  ControllerDescriptor controllerDescriptor = new ReflectedControllerDescriptor(controllerType);Di2015NewLine  ActionDescriptor actionDescriptor = controllerDescriptor.FindAction(controllerContext, actionName);Di2015NewLine  if (actionDescriptor == null)Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  FilterInfo filters = new FilterInfo(FilterProviders.Providers.GetFilters(Di2015NewLine    controllerContext, actionDescriptor));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  AuthorizationContext authContext = new AuthorizationContext(controllerContext, actionDescriptor);Di2015NewLine  foreach (IAuthorizationFilter authFilter in filters.AuthorizationFilters)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    authFilter.OnAuthorization(authContext);Di2015NewLine    if (authContext.Result != null)Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10398707Di2015UniqueSeparator    namespace Programming_CSharpDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   using System;Di2015NewLine   using System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLine   using System.IO;Di2015NewLine   using System.Reflection;Di2015NewLine   using System.Reflection.Emit;Di2015NewLine   using System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // used to benchmark the looping approachDi2015NewLine   public class MyMathDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      // sum numbers with a loopDi2015NewLine      public int DoSumLooping(int initialVal)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         int result = 0;Di2015NewLine         for(int i = 1;i <=initialVal;i++)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            result += i;Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         return result;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // declare the interfaceDi2015NewLine   public interface IComputerDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      int ComputeSum(  );Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public class ReflectionTestDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      // the private method which emits the assemblyDi2015NewLine      // using op codesDi2015NewLine      private Assembly EmitAssembly(int theValue)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         // Create an assembly nameDi2015NewLine         AssemblyName assemblyName = Di2015NewLine            new AssemblyName(  );Di2015NewLine         assemblyName.Name = "DoSumAssembly";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // Create a new assembly with one moduleDi2015NewLine         AssemblyBuilder newAssembly =Di2015NewLine            Thread.GetDomain(  ).DefineDynamicAssembly(Di2015NewLine            assemblyName, AssemblyBuilderAccess.Run);Di2015NewLine         ModuleBuilder newModule =Di2015NewLine            newAssembly.DefineDynamicModule("Sum");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         //  Define a public class named "BruteForceSums " Di2015NewLine         //  in the assembly.Di2015NewLine         TypeBuilder myType =Di2015NewLine            newModule.DefineType(Di2015NewLine            "BruteForceSums", TypeAttributes.Public);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // Mark the class as implementing IComputer.Di2015NewLine         myType.AddInterfaceImplementation(Di2015NewLine            typeof(IComputer));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // Define a method on the type to call. Pass anDi2015NewLine         // array that defines the types of the parameters,Di2015NewLine         // the type of the return type, the name of the Di2015NewLine         // method, and the method attributes.Di2015NewLine         Type[] paramTypes = new Type[0];Di2015NewLine         Type returnType = typeof(int);Di2015NewLine         MethodBuilder simpleMethod =Di2015NewLine            myType.DefineMethod(Di2015NewLine            "ComputeSum",Di2015NewLine            MethodAttributes.Public | Di2015NewLine            MethodAttributes.Virtual,Di2015NewLine            returnType,Di2015NewLine            paramTypes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // Get an ILGenerator. This is usedDi2015NewLine         // to emit the IL that you want.Di2015NewLine         ILGenerator generator = Di2015NewLine            simpleMethod.GetILGenerator(  );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // Emit the IL that you'd get if you Di2015NewLine         // compiled the code example Di2015NewLine         // and then ran ILDasm on the output.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // Push zero onto the stack. For each 'i' Di2015NewLine         // less than 'theValue', Di2015NewLine         // push 'i' onto the stack as a constantDi2015NewLine         // add the two values at the top of the stack.Di2015NewLine         // The sum is left on the stack.Di2015NewLine         generator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4, 0);Di2015NewLine         for (int i = 1; i <= theValue;i++)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            generator.Emit(OpCodes.Ldc_I4, i);Di2015NewLine            generator.Emit(OpCodes.Add);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // return the valueDi2015NewLine         generator.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         //Encapsulate information about the method andDi2015NewLine         //provide access to the method's metadataDi2015NewLine         MethodInfo computeSumInfo =Di2015NewLine            typeof(IComputer).GetMethod("ComputeSum");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // specify the method implementation.Di2015NewLine         // Pass in the MethodBuilder that was returned Di2015NewLine         // by calling DefineMethod and the methodInfo Di2015NewLine         // just createdDi2015NewLine         myType.DefineMethodOverride(simpleMethod, computeSumInfo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // Create the type.Di2015NewLine         myType.CreateType(  );Di2015NewLine         return newAssembly;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // check if the interface is nullDi2015NewLine      // if so, call Setup.Di2015NewLine      public double DoSum(int theValue)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         if (theComputer == null)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            GenerateCode(theValue);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // call the method through the interfaceDi2015NewLine         return (theComputer.ComputeSum(  ));Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // emit the assembly, create an instance Di2015NewLine      // and get the interfaceDi2015NewLine      public void GenerateCode(int theValue)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         Assembly theAssembly = EmitAssembly(theValue);Di2015NewLine         theComputer = (IComputer) Di2015NewLine            theAssembly.CreateInstance("BruteForceSums");Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // private member dataDi2015NewLine      IComputer theComputer = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public class TestDriverDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      public static void Main(  )Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         const int val = 2000;  // Note 2,000Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // 1 million iterations!Di2015NewLine         const int iterations = 1000000;Di2015NewLine         double result = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // run the benchmarkDi2015NewLine         MyMath m = new MyMath(  ); Di2015NewLine         DateTime startTime = DateTime.Now;            Di2015NewLine         for (int i = 0;i < iterations;i++)Di2015NewLine            result = m.DoSumLooping(val);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         TimeSpan elapsed = Di2015NewLine            DateTime.Now - startTime;Di2015NewLine         Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine            "Sum of ({0}) = {1}",val, result);Di2015NewLine         Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine            "Looping. Elapsed milliseconds: " + Di2015NewLine            elapsed.TotalMilliseconds + Di2015NewLine            " for {0} iterations", iterations);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         // run our reflection alternativeDi2015NewLine         ReflectionTest t = new ReflectionTest(  );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         startTime = DateTime.Now; Di2015NewLine         for (int i = 0;i < iterations;i++)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            result = t.DoSum(val);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         elapsed = DateTime.Now - startTime;Di2015NewLine         Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine            "Sum of ({0}) = {1}",val, result);Di2015NewLine         Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine            "Brute Force. Elapsed milliseconds: " + Di2015NewLine            elapsed.TotalMilliseconds  + Di2015NewLine            " for {0} iterations", iterations);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10399184Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FactorVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<object> factors = new List<object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private FactorVisitor(Expression<Func<int>> expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Visit(expression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static List<object> GetFactors(Expression<Func<int>> expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new FactorVisitor(expression).factors;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add this method for listing compile-time constant valuesDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitConstant(ConstantExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        factors.Add(node.Value);Di2015NewLine        return node;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitMember(MemberExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (CanBeEvaluated(node))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            factors.Add(Evaluate(node));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return node;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool CanBeEvaluated(MemberExpression exp)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (exp.Expression.NodeType == ExpressionType.MemberAccess)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            exp = (MemberExpression) exp.Expression;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (exp.Expression.NodeType == ExpressionType.Constant);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static object Evaluate(Expression exp)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (exp.NodeType == ExpressionType.Constant)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ((ConstantExpression) exp).Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MemberExpression mexp = (MemberExpression) exp;Di2015NewLine            object value = Evaluate(mexp.Expression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            FieldInfo field = mexp.Member as FieldInfo;Di2015NewLine            if (field != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return field.GetValue(value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                PropertyInfo property = (PropertyInfo) mexp.Member;Di2015NewLine                return property.GetValue(value, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10403061Di2015UniqueSeparator    static Assembly Compile(string script)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CompilerParameters options = new CompilerParameters();Di2015NewLine        options.GenerateExecutable = false;Di2015NewLine        options.GenerateInMemory = true;Di2015NewLine        options.ReferencedAssemblies.Add("System.dll");Di2015NewLine        options.ReferencedAssemblies.Add("ScriptProxy.dll");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider provider = new Microsoft.CSharp.CSharpCodeProvider();Di2015NewLine        CompilerResults result = provider.CompileAssemblyFromSource(options, script);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check the compiler results for errorsDi2015NewLine        StringWriter sw = new StringWriter();Di2015NewLine        foreach (CompilerError ce in result.Errors)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (ce.IsWarning) continue;Di2015NewLine            sw.WriteLine("{0}({1},{2}: error {3}: {4}", ce.FileName, ce.Line, ce.Column, ce.ErrorNumber, ce.ErrorText);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // If there were errors, raise an exception...Di2015NewLine        string errorText = sw.ToString();Di2015NewLine        if (errorText.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException(errorText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result.CompiledAssembly;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10417114Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static Dictionary<string, Dictionary<object, int>> Di2015NewLine    getDistinctValues<T>(List<T> list)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var properties = typeof(T).GetProperties();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var result = propertiesDi2015NewLine        //The key of the first dictionary is the property nameDi2015NewLine        .ToDictionary(prop => prop.Name,Di2015NewLine            //the value is another dictionaryDi2015NewLine            prop => list.GroupBy(item => prop.GetValue(item, null))Di2015NewLine                //The key of the inner dictionary is the unique property valueDi2015NewLine                //the value if the inner dictionary is the count of that group.Di2015NewLine                .ToDictionary(group => group.Key, group => group.Count()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10418242Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ParallelEvent<TEventArg> where TEventArg : EventArgsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly EventHandler<TEventArg> _handler1;Di2015NewLine    private readonly EventHandler<TEventArg>[] _moreHandlers;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ParallelEvent(EventHandler<TEventArg> handler1, params EventHandler<TEventArg>[] moreHandlers)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (handler1 == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("handler1");Di2015NewLine        if (moreHandlers == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("moreHandlers");Di2015NewLine        _handler1 = handler1;Di2015NewLine        _moreHandlers = moreHandlers;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Handler(Object sender, TEventArg args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IAsyncResult[] asyncResults = new IAsyncResult[_moreHandlers.Length];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < _moreHandlers.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            asyncResults[i] = _moreHandlers[i].BeginInvoke(sender, args, null, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _handler1(sender, args);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < _moreHandlers.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            _moreHandlers[i].EndInvoke(asyncResults[i]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

this.outgoingHeaders[headerName]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                this.outgoingHeaders.Clear();Di2015NewLine                return this.Channel.Subtract(x, y);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void AddOutgoingHeader(string name, string value)Di2015NewLine 10421289Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class FilterConverter : TypeConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvertTo (ITypeDescriptorContext context, Type destinationType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return destinationType == typeof(InstanceDescriptor) || base.CanConvertTo (context, destinationType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ConvertTo (ITypeDescriptorContext context, CultureInfo culture, object value, Type destinationType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (destinationType == typeof(InstanceDescriptor) && value is Filter)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ConstructorInfo constructor = typeof (Filter).GetConstructor (new[] {typeof (string), typeof (string)});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var filter = value as Filter;Di2015NewLine            var descriptor = new InstanceDescriptor (constructor, new[] {filter.Name, filter.Value}, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return descriptor;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return base.ConvertTo (context, culture, value, destinationType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10423682Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class PropertyInfoExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Action<object, object> GetValueSetter(this PropertyInfo propertyInfo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var instance = Expression.Parameter(typeof(object), "i");Di2015NewLine        var argument = Expression.Parameter(typeof(object), "a");Di2015NewLine        var setterCall = Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine            Expression.Convert(instance, propertyInfo.DeclaringType),Di2015NewLine            propertyInfo.GetSetMethod(),Di2015NewLine            Expression.Convert(argument, propertyInfo.PropertyType));Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Action<object,object>>(setterCall, instance, argument).Compile();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10423773Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string requestByProxy(string url)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string responseString, proxyAddress;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (responseString == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(url);Di2015NewLine            // set properties, headers, etcDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            proxyAddress = getNextProxy();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (proxyAddress == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception("No more proxies");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            request.Proxy = new WebProxy(proxyAddress);Di2015NewLine            request.Timeout = 15 * 1000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine            StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(response.GetResponseStream());Di2015NewLine            responseString = sr.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (WebException wex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return responseString;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10434345Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static BlockingCollection<Bar> Merge(IEnumerable<BlockingCollection<Bar>> collections)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BlockingCollection<Bar> masterCollection = new BlockingCollection<Bar>();Di2015NewLine        LinkedList<BarWrapper> orderedLows = new LinkedList<BarWrapper>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var c in collections)Di2015NewLine            OrderedInsert(new BarWrapper { Value = c.Take(), Source = c }, orderedLows);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (orderedLows.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            BarWrapper currentLow = orderedLows.First.Value;Di2015NewLine            orderedLows.RemoveFirst();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            BlockingCollection<Bar> collection = currentLow.Source;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (collection.Any())Di2015NewLine                OrderedInsert(new BarWrapper { Value = collection.Take(), Source = collection }, orderedLows);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            masterCollection.Add(currentLow.Value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return masterCollection;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void OrderedInsert(BarWrapper bar, LinkedList<BarWrapper> orderedLows)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!orderedLows.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            orderedLows.AddFirst(bar);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var iterator = orderedLows.First;Di2015NewLine        while (iterator != null && iterator.Value.Value.LongValue < bar.Value.LongValue)Di2015NewLine            iterator = iterator.Next;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (iterator == null)Di2015NewLine            orderedLows.AddLast(bar);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            orderedLows.AddBefore(iterator, bar);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class BarWrapperDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Bar Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public BlockingCollection<Bar> Source { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class BarDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Bar(long l)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.LongValue = l;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public long LongValue { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10434708Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class ResponseReceivedEventArgs : EventArgsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public ResponseReceivedEventArgs(string id, string response)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Id = id;Di2015NewLine        Response = response;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string IdDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private set;Di2015NewLine        get;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string ResponseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private set;Di2015NewLine        get;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic delegate void ResponseReceived(object sender, ResponseReceivedEventArgs e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic sealed class NamedPipeCommandsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Queue<Tuple<string, string>> _queuedCommands = new Queue<Tuple<string,string>>();Di2015NewLine    private string _currentId;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly Thread _sender;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Thread _receiver;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Equivalent to receiving a "quit" on the consoleDi2015NewLine    private bool _cancelRequested; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // To wait till a response is received for a request and THEN proceedDi2015NewLine    private readonly AutoResetEvent _waitForResponse = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Lock to modify the command queue safelyDi2015NewLine    private readonly object _commandQueueLock = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Raise an event when a response is receivedDi2015NewLine    private void RaiseResponseReceived(string id, string message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ResponseReceived != null)Di2015NewLine            ResponseReceived(this, new ResponseReceivedEventArgs(id, message));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add a command to queue of outgoing commandsDi2015NewLine    // Returns the id of the enqueued commandDi2015NewLine    // So the user can relate it with the corresponding responseDi2015NewLine    public string EnqueueCommand(string command)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var resultId = Guid.NewGuid().ToString();Di2015NewLine        lock (_commandQueueLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _queuedCommands.Enqueue(Tuple.Create(resultId, command));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return resultId;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Constructor. Please pass in whatever parameters the two pipes needDi2015NewLine    // The list below may be incompleteDi2015NewLine    public NamedPipeCommands(string servername, string pipeName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _sender = new Thread(syncClientServer =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Body of threadDi2015NewLine            var waitForResponse = (AutoResetEvent)syncClientServer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (var pipeStream = new NamedPipeClientStream(servername, pipeName, PipeDirection.Out, PipeOptions.None))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                pipeStream.Connect();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                using (var sw = new StreamWriter(pipeStream) { AutoFlush = true })Di2015NewLine                    // Do this till Cancel() is calledDi2015NewLine                    while (!_cancelRequested)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // No commands? Keep waitingDi2015NewLine                        // This is a tight loop, perhaps a Thread.Yield or something?Di2015NewLine                        if (_queuedCommands.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                            continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        Tuple<string, string> _currentCommand = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // We're going to modify the command queue, lock itDi2015NewLine                        lock (_commandQueueLock)Di2015NewLine                            // Check to see if someone else stole our commandDi2015NewLine                            // before we got hereDi2015NewLine                            if (_queuedCommands.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                                _currentCommand = _queuedCommands.Dequeue();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Was a command dequeued above?Di2015NewLine                        if (_currentCommand != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            _currentId = _currentCommand.Item1;Di2015NewLine                            sw.WriteLine(_currentCommand.Item2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // Wait for the response to this commandDi2015NewLine                            waitForResponse.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _receiver = new Thread(syncClientServer =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var waitForResponse = (AutoResetEvent)syncClientServer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (var pipeStream = new NamedPipeClientStream(servername, pipeName, PipeDirection.In, PipeOptions.None))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                pipeStream.Connect();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                using (var sr = new StreamReader(pipeStream))Di2015NewLine                    // Do this till Cancel() is calledDi2015NewLine                    // Again, this is a tight loop, perhaps a Thread.Yield or something?Di2015NewLine                    while (!_cancelRequested)Di2015NewLine                        // If there's anything in the streamDi2015NewLine                        if (!sr.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            // Read itDi2015NewLine                            var response = sr.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                            // Raise the event for processingDi2015NewLine                            // Note that this event is being raised from theDi2015NewLine                            // receiver thread and you can't access UI hereDi2015NewLine                            // You will need to Control.BeginInvoke or some suchDi2015NewLine                            RaiseResponseReceived(_currentId, response);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // Proceed with sending subsequent commandsDi2015NewLine                            waitForResponse.Set();Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Start()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _sender.Start(_waitForResponse);Di2015NewLine        _receiver.Start(_waitForResponse);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Cancel()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _cancelRequested = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event ResponseReceived ResponseReceived;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10439333Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    LeadingZeros(2).Dump();  //30Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint LeadingZeros(int x)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        x |= (x >> 1);Di2015NewLine        x |= (x >> 2);Di2015NewLine        x |= (x >> 4);Di2015NewLine        x |= (x >> 8);Di2015NewLine        x |= (x >> 16);Di2015NewLine        return(sizeof(int)*8 -Ones(x));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineint Ones(int x)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        x -= ((x >> 1) & 0x55555555);Di2015NewLine        x = (((x >> 2) & 0x33333333) + (x & 0x33333333));Di2015NewLine        x = (((x >> 4) + x) & 0x0f0f0f0f);Di2015NewLine        x += (x >> 8);Di2015NewLine        x += (x >> 16);Di2015NewLine        return(x & 0x0000003f);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10451012Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static List<T> MergeSorted<T>(IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> sortedBunches)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var list = sortedBunches.SelectMany(bunch => bunch).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    list.Sort();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return list;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10451012Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static IEnumerable<T> MergeSorted<T>(IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> sortedInts) where T : IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var enumerators = new List<IEnumerator<T>>(sortedInts.Select(ints => ints.GetEnumerator()).Where(e => e.MoveNext()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        enumerators.Sort((e1, e2) => e1.Current.CompareTo(e2.Current));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (enumerators.Count > 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return enumerators[0].Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (enumerators[0].MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (enumerators[0].Current.CompareTo(enumerators[1].Current) == 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var tmp = enumerators[0];Di2015NewLine                    enumerators[0] = enumerators[1];Di2015NewLine                    enumerators[1] = tmp;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                enumerators.RemoveAt(0);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return enumerators[0].Current;Di2015NewLine        } while (enumerators[0].MoveNext());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10455236Di2015UniqueSeparatorOption
10455236Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Controls;Di2015NewLineusing System.ComponentModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.ObjectModel;Di2015NewLinenamespace DataGridSpikeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Interaction logic for MainWindow.xamlDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public partial class MainWindow : WindowDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private List<Option> _unsortedOptions;Di2015NewLine        private ObservableCollection<OptionRow> _groupedOptions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ObservableCollection<OptionRow> GroupedOptionsDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _groupedOptions; }Di2015NewLine            set { _groupedOptions = value; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public MainWindow()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var rnd=new Random();Di2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Generate some random dataDi2015NewLine            _unsortedOptions=new List<Option>();Di2015NewLine            for(int element=0;element<50;element++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                double column=rnd.Next(-2,3);Di2015NewLine                int row=rnd.Next(0,9);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                _unsortedOptions.Add(new Option { ColumnDefiningValue = column, RowDefiningValue = row });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Prepare the data for the DataGridDi2015NewLine            //group and sortDi2015NewLine            var rows = from option in _unsortedOptionsDi2015NewLine                       orderby option.ColumnDefiningValueDi2015NewLine                       group option by option.RowDefiningValue into optionRowDi2015NewLine                       orderby optionRow.Key ascendingDi2015NewLine                       select optionRow;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //convert to ObservableCollectionDi2015NewLine            _groupedOptions = new ObservableCollection<OptionRow>();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var groupedOptionRow in rows)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var groupedRow = new 10459910Di2015UniqueSeparator(?<=\\}\\s*)(?<selector>[^\\{\\}]+?)(?:\\s*\\{(?<style>[^\\{\\}]+)\\})Di2015NewLine
10459910Di2015UniqueSeparator// (?<=\\}\\s*)(?<selector>[^\\{\\}]+?)(?:\\s*\\{(?<style>[^\\{\\}]+)\\})Di2015NewLine// Di2015NewLine// Options: case insensitive; ^ and $ match at line breaksDi2015NewLine// Di2015NewLine// Assert that the regex below can be matched, with the match ending at this position (positive lookbehind) (?<=\\}\\s*)Di2015NewLine//    Match the character }? literally \\}Di2015NewLine//    Match a single character that is a whitespace character? (spaces, tabs, and line breaks) \\s*Di2015NewLine//       Between zero and unlimited times, as many times as possible, giving back as needed (greedy) *Di2015NewLine// Match the regular expression below and capture its match into backreference with name selector? (?<selector>[^\\{\\}]+?)Di2015NewLine//    Match a single character NOT present in the list below [^\\{\\}]+?Di2015NewLine//       Between one and unlimited times, as few times as possible, expanding as needed (lazy) +?Di2015NewLine//       A { character \\{Di2015NewLine//       A } character \\}Di2015NewLine// Match the regular expression below (?:\\s*\\{(?<style>[^\\{\\}]+)\\})Di2015NewLine//    Match a single character that is a whitespace character? (spaces, tabs, and line breaks) \\s*Di2015NewLine//       Between zero and unlimited times, as many times as possible, giving back as needed (greedy) *Di2015NewLine//    Match the character {? literally \\{Di2015NewLine//    Match the regular expression below and capture its match into backreference with name style? (?<style>[^\\{\\}]+)Di2015NewLine//       Match a single character NOT present in the list below [^\\{\\}]+Di2015NewLine//          Between one and unlimited times, as many times as possible, giving back as needed (greedy) +Di2015NewLine//          A { character \\{Di2015NewLine//          A } character \\}Di2015NewLine//    Match the character }? literally \\}Di2015NewLine

10460884Di2015UniqueSeparator private void Animationsss(Grid grd)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //create an animationDi2015NewLine            DoubleAnimation da = new DoubleAnimation();Di2015NewLine            //set from animation to start position Di2015NewLine            //dont forget set canvas.left for grid if u dont u will get errorDi2015NewLine            da.From = Canvas.GetLeft(grd);Di2015NewLine            //set second position of gridDi2015NewLine            da.To = -100;Di2015NewLine            //set durationDi2015NewLine            da.Duration = new Duration(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(2));Di2015NewLine            //run animation if u want stop ,start etc use story boardDi2015NewLine            grd.BeginAnimation(Canvas.LeftProperty, da);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine
10460884Di2015UniqueSeparator private void Animation(Grid grd)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ThicknessAnimation ta = new ThicknessAnimation();Di2015NewLine            //your first placeDi2015NewLine            ta.From = grd.Margin;Di2015NewLine            //this move your grid 1000 over from left sideDi2015NewLine            //you can use -1000 to move to left sideDi2015NewLine            ta.To = new Thickness(1000, 0, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine            //time the animation playesDi2015NewLine            ta.Duration = new Duration(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(10));Di2015NewLine            //dont need to use story board but if you want pause,stop etc use story boardDi2015NewLine            grd.BeginAnimation(Grid.MarginProperty, ta);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

10462220Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace TetrahedronVerticesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Size parameter: This is distance of each vector from originDi2015NewLine            var r = 1d;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Generating a dodecahedron with enclosing sphere radius: " + r);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Make the verticesDi2015NewLine            var dodecahedron = MakeDodecahedron(r);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Print them outDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("       X        Y        Z");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("   ==========================");Di2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i < dodecahedron.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var vertex = dodecahedron[i];Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("{0,2}:" + vertex, i + 1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("\\nDone!");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Generates a list of vertices (in arbitrary order) for a tetrahedron centered on the origin.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="r">The distance of each vertex from origin.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        private static IList<Vertex> MakeDodecahedron(double r)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Calculate constants that will be used to generate verticesDi2015NewLine            var phi = (float) (Math.Sqrt(5) - 1) / 2; // The golden ratioDi2015NewLine            var R = (float) (r / Math.Sqrt(3));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var a = (R * 1);Di2015NewLine            var b = R / phi;Di2015NewLine            var c = R * phi;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Generate each vertexDi2015NewLine            var vertices = new List<Vertex>();Di2015NewLine            for (var i = -1; i < 2; i += 2)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (var j = -1; j < 2; j += 2)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    vertices.Add(new Vertex(Di2015NewLine                                        0,Di2015NewLine                                        i * c * R,Di2015NewLine                                        j * b * R));Di2015NewLine                    vertices.Add(new Vertex(Di2015NewLine                                        i * c * R,Di2015NewLine                                        j * b * R,Di2015NewLine                                        0));Di2015NewLine                    vertices.Add(new Vertex(Di2015NewLine                                        i * b * R,Di2015NewLine                                        0,Di2015NewLine                                        j * c * R));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    for (var k = -1; k < 2; k += 2)Di2015NewLine                        vertices.Add(new Vertex(Di2015NewLine                                            i * a * R,Di2015NewLine                                            j * a * R,Di2015NewLine                                            k * a * R));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return vertices;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// A placeholder class to store data on a point in space. Don't actually use this, write a better class (or just use Vector3 from XNA).Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    class VertexDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        float x;Di2015NewLine        float y;Di2015NewLine        float z;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Vertex(float x, float y, float z)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.x = x;Di2015NewLine            this.y = y;Di2015NewLine            this.z = z;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var s = String.Format("{0,8:F2},{1,8:F2},{2,8:F2}", x, y, z);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return s;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10462394Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void DrawStringWithStyle( this SpriteBatch batch, SpriteFont font, Vector2 pos, string text, Color color, SpriteFont BoldFont=null )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string[] paragraphs = Regex.Split( text, @"\\\\(c[a-fA-F0-9]{6})|\\\\(b)|\\\\(n)" );Di2015NewLine    Color CurrentColor = color;Di2015NewLine    SpriteFont CurrentFont = font;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for ( int i=0; i< paragraphs.Length; i++ )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        batch.DrawString( CurrentFont, paragraphs[i], pos, CurrentColor );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ( i+1<paragraphs.Length )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            pos.X += CurrentFont.MeasureString( paragraphs[i] ).X;Di2015NewLine            i++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            switch (char.ToLower(paragraphs[i][0]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case 'c':Di2015NewLine                    CurrentColor.R = byte.Parse( paragraphs[i].Substring( 1, 2 ) );Di2015NewLine                    CurrentColor.G = byte.Parse( paragraphs[i].Substring( 3, 2 ) );Di2015NewLine                    CurrentColor.B = byte.Parse( paragraphs[i].Substring( 5, 2 ) );Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case 'n': CurrentFont = font; break;Di2015NewLine                case 'b': CurrentFont = BoldFont; break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10464403Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate List<string> GenerateTerms(string[] docs)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     var result = docsDi2015NewLine         .SelectMany(doc => doc.Split(' ')Di2015NewLine                               .GroupBy(word => word)Di2015NewLine                               .OrderByDescending(g => g.Count())Di2015NewLine                               .Select(g => g.Key)Di2015NewLine                               .Take(20000))Di2015NewLine         .Distinct()Di2015NewLine         .ToList();   Di2015NewLine     return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10464403Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate List<string> GenerateTerms(string[] docs)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return docs.SelectMany(doc => ProcessDocument(doc)).Distinct().ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate IEnumerable<string> ProcessDocument(string doc)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return doc.Split(' ')Di2015NewLine              .GroupBy(word => word)Di2015NewLine              .OrderByDescending(g => g.Count())Di2015NewLine              .Select(g => g.Key)Di2015NewLine              .Take(10000);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10464765Di2015UniqueSeparator        public string GetGazetteer(DataTable dtInput)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string result = null;Di2015NewLine            List<Container> containers = new List<Container>();Di2015NewLine            List<Container> finalContainers = new List<Container>();Di2015NewLine            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (DataRow row in dtInput.Rows)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Container container;Di2015NewLine                container = new Container() { Id = int.Parse(row[0].ToString()), Value = row[1].ToString(), Col = 1 };Di2015NewLine                containers.Add(container);Di2015NewLine                if (row[1] != row[3])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    container = new Container() { Id = int.Parse(row[0].ToString()), Value = row[3].ToString(), Col = 2 };Di2015NewLine                    containers.Add(container);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            containers = containers.OrderBy(c => c.Value).ThenBy(c => c.Id).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (containers.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string initialVal = containers[0].Value;Di2015NewLine                finalContainers.Add(containers[0]);Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 1; i < containers.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (containers[i].Value == initialVal)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        finalContainers.Remove(containers[i]);Di2015NewLine                        finalContainers.Remove(containers[i - 1]);Di2015NewLine                        finalContainers.Add(new Container() { Id = containers[i - 1].Id, Value = "*" + containers[i - 1].Id + " is duplicate of " + containers[i].Id + "* " + containers[i - 1].Value });Di2015NewLine                        finalContainers.Add(new Container() { Id = containers[i].Id, Value = "*" + containers[i].Id + " is duplicate of " + containers[i - 1].Id + "* " + containers[i].Value });Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        finalContainers.Add(containers[i]);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    initialVal = containers[i].Value;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                finalContainers = finalContainers.OrderBy(c => c.Id).ThenBy(c => c.Col).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (Container container in finalContainers)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    sb.Append(container.Value + "</br>");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                result = sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine

10465460Di2015UniqueSeparatorDid read 258.888.890 bytes with 77 MB/sDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineunsafe class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        new Program().Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Start()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        string fileName = @"C:\\Source\\BigFile.txt";//@"C:\\Source\\Numbers.txt";Di2015NewLine        var file = MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile(fileName);Di2015NewLine        var fileSize = new FileInfo(fileName).Length;Di2015NewLine        int viewSize = 200 * 100 * 1000;Di2015NewLine        long offset = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (; offset < fileSize-viewSize; offset +=viewSize ) // create 200 MB viewsDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var accessor = file.CreateViewAccessor(offset, viewSize))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int unReadBytes = ReadData(accessor, offset);Di2015NewLine                offset -= unReadBytes;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var rest = file.CreateViewAccessor(offset, fileSize - offset))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ReadData(rest, offset);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Did read {0:N0} bytes with {1:F0} MB/s", fileSize, (fileSize / (1024 * 1024)) / sw.Elapsed.TotalSeconds);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<int> Data = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int ReadData(MemoryMappedViewAccessor accessor, long offset)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using(var safeViewHandle = accessor.SafeMemoryMappedViewHandle)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte* pStart = null;Di2015NewLine            safeViewHandle.AcquirePointer(ref pStart);Di2015NewLine            ulong correction = 0;Di2015NewLine            // needed to correct offset because the view handle does not start at the offset specified in the CreateAccessor callDi2015NewLine            // This makes AquirePointer nearly useless.Di2015NewLine            // http://connect.microsoft.com/VisualStudio/feedback/details/537635/no-way-to-determine-internal-offset-used-by-memorymappedviewaccessor-makes-safememorymappedviewhandle-property-unusableDi2015NewLine            pStart = Helper.Pointer(pStart, offset, out correction);Di2015NewLine            var len = safeViewHandle.ByteLength - correction;Di2015NewLine            bool digitFound = false;Di2015NewLine            int curInt = 0;Di2015NewLine            byte current =0;Di2015NewLine            for (ulong i = 0; i < len; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                current = *(pStart + i);Di2015NewLine                if (current == (byte)' ' && digitFound)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Data.Add(curInt);Di2015NewLine                  //  Console.WriteLine("Add {0}", curInt);Di2015NewLine                    digitFound = false;Di2015NewLine                    curInt = 0;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    curInt = curInt * 10 + (current - '0');Di2015NewLine                    digitFound = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // scan backwards to find partial read numberDi2015NewLine            int unread = 0;Di2015NewLine            if (curInt != 0 && digitFound)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte* pEnd = pStart + len;Di2015NewLine                while (true)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    pEnd--;Di2015NewLine                    if (*pEnd == (byte)' ' || pEnd == pStart)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    unread++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            safeViewHandle.ReleasePointer();Di2015NewLine            return unread;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public unsafe static class HelperDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static SYSTEM_INFO info;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static Helper()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            GetSystemInfo(ref info);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static byte* Pointer(byte *pByte, long offset, out ulong diff)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var num = offset % info.dwAllocationGranularity;Di2015NewLine            diff = (ulong)num; // return differenceDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte* tmp_ptr = pByte;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tmp_ptr += num;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return tmp_ptr;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine        internal static extern void GetSystemInfo(ref SYSTEM_INFO lpSystemInfo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        internal struct SYSTEM_INFODi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            internal int dwOemId;Di2015NewLine            internal int dwPageSize;Di2015NewLine            internal IntPtr lpMinimumApplicationAddress;Di2015NewLine            internal IntPtr lpMaximumApplicationAddress;Di2015NewLine            internal IntPtr dwActiveProcessorMask;Di2015NewLine            internal int dwNumberOfProcessors;Di2015NewLine            internal int dwProcessorType;Di2015NewLine            internal int dwAllocationGranularity;Di2015NewLine            internal short wProcessorLevel;Di2015NewLine            internal short wProcessorRevision;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void GenerateNumbers()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var file = File.CreateText(@"C:\\Source\\BigFile.txt"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 30 * 1000 * 1000; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                file.Write(i.ToString() + " ");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (value != null)Di2015NewLine                matchType = value;Di2015NewLine            else if (MatchTypes != null && MatchTypes.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                matchType = MatchTypes[0];Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            PropertyHasChanged(() => SelectedMatchType);Di2015NewLine            PopulateTeams();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Team teamA;Di2015NewLine    Team teamB;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Team SelectedTeamA Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return teamA; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (teamA.ID == teamB.ID)Di2015NewLine                // Alternatively, set a flag and stop execution.Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("The same team cannot be selected.");Di2015NewLine            teamA = value;Di2015NewLine            PopulateTeams();Di2015NewLine            PropertyHasChanged(() => SelectedTeamA);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Team SelectedTeamB Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return teamB; }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (teamA.ID == teamB.ID)Di2015NewLine                // Alternatively, set a flag and stop execution.Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("The same team cannot be selected.");Di2015NewLine            teamB = value;Di2015NewLine            PopulateTeams();Di2015NewLine            PropertyHasChanged(() => SelectedTeamB);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// This can be done on your model, or what I do is pass it to Di2015NewLine    /// an intermediary class, then that sets the busy status toDi2015NewLine    /// a BusyIndicator set as the visual root of the application.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public bool IsBusy { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public string IsBusyDoingWhat { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TeamSelection()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Call out to DB for the match types, setting busy statusDi2015NewLine        var wcf = new WcfService();Di2015NewLine        wcf.GetMatchTypes(response => Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            wcf.GetMatchTypesForTeam(MatchType, response2 =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                teams = response.Value.ToArray();Di2015NewLine                MatchTypes = response2.Value.ToArray();Di2015NewLine                MatchType = MatchTypes[0];Di2015NewLine                PopulateTeams();Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void PopulateTeams()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (MatchType == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        var op = teams.Where(t => t.MatchTypeID == MatchType.ID);Di2015NewLine        if (SelectedTeamA != null)Di2015NewLine            TeamsB = op.Where(t => t.ID != SelectedTeamA.ID).OrderBy(t => t.Name);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            TeamsB = op.OrderBy(t => t.Name);Di2015NewLine        if (SelectedTeamB != null)Di2015NewLine            TeamsA = op.Where(t => t.ID != SelectedTeamB.ID).OrderBy(t => t.Name);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            TeamsA = op.OrderBy(t => t.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10482527Di2015UniqueSeparator// 1. Data structure to track items we've seenDi2015NewLinevar found = new HashSet<Tuple<string, int>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// 2. Data structure to track items we should outputDi2015NewLinevar output = new HashSet<Tuple<string, int>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// 3. 10485867Di2015UniqueSeparator            Point p = pictureBox1.PointToClient(Cursor.Position);Di2015NewLine            Point unscaled_p = new Point();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // image and container dimensionsDi2015NewLine            int w_i = pictureBox1.Image.Width; Di2015NewLine            int h_i = pictureBox1.Image.Height;Di2015NewLine            int w_c = pictureBox1.Width;Di2015NewLine            int h_c = pictureBox1.Height;Di2015NewLine
10485867Di2015UniqueSeparator            float imageRatio = w_i / (float)h_i; // image W:H ratioDi2015NewLine            float containerRatio = w_c / (float)h_c; // container W:H ratioDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (imageRatio >= containerRatio)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // horizontal imageDi2015NewLine                float scaleFactor = w_c / (float)w_i;Di2015NewLine                float scaledHeight = h_i * scaleFactor;Di2015NewLine                // calculate gap between top of container and top of imageDi2015NewLine                float filler = Math.Abs(h_c - scaledHeight) / 2;  Di2015NewLine                unscaled_p.X = (int)(p.X / scaleFactor);Di2015NewLine                unscaled_p.Y = (int)((p.Y - filler) / scaleFactor);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // vertical imageDi2015NewLine                float scaleFactor = h_c / (float)h_i;Di2015NewLine                float scaledWidth = w_i * scaleFactor;Di2015NewLine                float filler = Math.Abs(w_c - scaledWidth) / 2;Di2015NewLine                unscaled_p.X = (int)((p.X - filler) / scaleFactor);Di2015NewLine                unscaled_p.Y = (int)(p.Y / scaleFactor);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return unscaled_p;Di2015NewLine

10486134Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] AddPageNumbers(byte[] pdf)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineMemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLinems.Write(pdf, 0, pdf.Length);Di2015NewLine// we create a reader for a certain documentDi2015NewLinePdfReader reader = new PdfReader(pdf);Di2015NewLine// we retrieve the total number of pagesDi2015NewLineint n = reader.NumberOfPages;Di2015NewLine// we retrieve the size of the first pageDi2015NewLineRectangle psize = reader.GetPageSize(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// step 1: creation of a document-objectDi2015NewLineDocument document = new Document(psize, 50, 50, 50, 50);Di2015NewLine// step 2: we create a writer that listens to the documentDi2015NewLinePdfWriter writer = PdfWriter.GetInstance(document, ms);Di2015NewLine// step 3: we open the documentDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedocument.Open();Di2015NewLine// step 4: we add contentDi2015NewLinePdfContentByte cb = writer.DirectContent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint p = 0;Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("There are " + n + " pages in the document.");Di2015NewLinefor (int page = 1; page <= reader.NumberOfPages; page++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    document.NewPage();Di2015NewLine    p++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    PdfImportedPage importedPage = writer.GetImportedPage(reader, page);Di2015NewLine    cb.AddTemplate(importedPage, 0, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    BaseFont bf = BaseFont.CreateFont(BaseFont.HELVETICA, BaseFont.CP1252, BaseFont.NOT_EMBEDDED);Di2015NewLine    cb.BeginText();Di2015NewLine    cb.SetFontAndSize(bf, 10);Di2015NewLine    cb.ShowTextAligned(PdfContentByte.ALIGN_LEFT, +p + "/" + n, 7, 44, 0);Di2015NewLine    cb.EndText();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// step 5: we close the documentDi2015NewLinedocument.Close();Di2015NewLinereturn ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10486441Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class WithEventDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // this is the new published eventDi2015NewLine        public EventHandler<EventArgs> NewMouseEvent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This handles the original mouse event of the inner classDi2015NewLine        public void OriginalEventhandler(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // this raises the published event (if susbcribedby any handler)Di2015NewLine            if (NewMouseEvent != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                NewMouseEvent(this, e);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class SubscriberDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public void Handler(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // this is the second class handlerDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Subscribe()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            WithEvent we = new WithEvent();Di2015NewLine            // This is how you subscribe the handler of the second classDi2015NewLine            we.NewMouseEvent += Handler;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10487771Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Task<MemoryStream> GetMemoryStreamAsync(AmazonS3 s3, Di2015NewLine    GetObjectRequest request)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Start the task of downloading.Di2015NewLine    Task<GetObjectResponse> response = Di2015NewLine        Task.Factory.FromAsync<GetObjectRequest,GetObjectResponse>(Di2015NewLine            s3.BeginGetObject, s3.EndGetObject, request, nullDi2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Translate.Di2015NewLine    Task<MemoryStream> translation = response.ContinueWith(t => {Di2015NewLine        using (Task<GetObjectResponse> resp = t ){Di2015NewLine            var ms = new MemoryStream(); Di2015NewLine            t.Result.ResponseStream.CopyTo(ms); Di2015NewLine            return ms;Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Return the full task chain.Di2015NewLine    return translation;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10490849Di2015UniqueSeparatormouse_event
10490849Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Move(int xDelta, int yDelta, int timeInMilliseconds, bool async = false)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // No need to move the mouse at all.Di2015NewLine    if (xDelta == 0 && yDelta == 0) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // No need to move smoothly.Di2015NewLine    if (timeInMilliseconds <= 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Move(xDelta, yDelta);Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Set direction factors and then make the delta's positiveDi2015NewLine    var xFactor = 1;Di2015NewLine    var yFactor = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (xDelta < 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        xDelta *= (xFactor = -1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (yDelta < 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yDelta *= (yFactor = -1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Calculate the rates of a single x or y movement, in millisecondsDi2015NewLine    // And avoid dividing by zeroDi2015NewLine    var xRate = xDelta == 0 ? -1 : (double)timeInMilliseconds / xDelta;Di2015NewLine    var yRate = yDelta == 0 ? -1 : (double)timeInMilliseconds / yDelta;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Make a thread that will move the mouse in the x directionDi2015NewLine    var xThread = new Thread(() =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // No need to move in the x directionDi2015NewLine        if (xDelta == 0) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        var c = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < xDelta; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Wait for another "rate" amount of time to passDi2015NewLine            while (sw.ElapsedMilliseconds / xRate < c)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            c++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Move by a single pixel (x)Di2015NewLine            Move(xFactor, 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Make a thread that will move the mouse in the y directionDi2015NewLine    var yThread = new Thread(() =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // No need to move in the y directionDi2015NewLine        if (yDelta == 0) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine        var c = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < yDelta; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Wait for another "rate" amount of time to passDi2015NewLine            while (sw.ElapsedMilliseconds / yRate < c)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            c++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Move by a single pixel (y)Di2015NewLine            Move(0, yFactor);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Activate the movers threadsDi2015NewLine    xThread.Start();Di2015NewLine    yThread.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (async)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Wait for both to end (remove this if you want it async)Di2015NewLine    xThread.Join();Di2015NewLine    yThread.Join();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10490884Di2015UniqueSeparatorXDocument MyXDoc;Di2015NewLine// TODO, load or parse MyXDocDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring[] CsvList = MyXDoc.Root.Elements("row")Di2015NewLine    .Select(row => Di2015NewLine        String.Join(", ", row.Elements("value").Select(val => (string)val).ToArray() )Di2015NewLine     )Di2015NewLine    .ToArray();Di2015NewLine

10494424Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static Task<T> Retry<T>(Func<T> func, int retryCount, int delay, TaskCompletionSource<T> tcs = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (tcs == null)Di2015NewLine            tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<T>();Di2015NewLine        Task.Factory.StartNew(func).ContinueWith(_original =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_original.IsFaulted)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (retryCount == 0)Di2015NewLine                    tcs.SetException(_original.Exception.InnerExceptions);Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    Task.Factory.StartNewDelayed(delay).ContinueWith(t =>Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Retry(func, retryCount - 1, delay,tcs);Di2015NewLine                    });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                tcs.SetResult(_original.Result);Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine        return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine

10495089Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal Buffer(IEnumerable<TElement> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   TElement[] array = null;Di2015NewLine   ICollection<TElement> is2 = source as ICollection<TElement>;Di2015NewLine   length = is2.Count;Di2015NewLine   if (length > 0)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       array = new TElement[length];Di2015NewLine       // implemented as Array.Copy(this._items, 0, array, 0, this._size);Di2015NewLine       is2.CopyTo(array, 0);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   this.items = array;Di2015NewLine   this.count = length;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10495089Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Linq.Enumerable
10495089Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal TElement[] ToArray()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   if (this.count == 0)        Di2015NewLine       return new TElement[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   if (this.items.Length == this.count)        Di2015NewLine       return this.items;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   TElement[] destinationArray = new TElement[this.count];Di2015NewLine   Array.Copy(this.items, 0, destinationArray, 0, this.count);Di2015NewLine   return destinationArray;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

");Di2015NewLine            DoSomething(powerValues, (e) => e.powerR, 0.003);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Lightbulbs matching criteria . . . ");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10498109Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void BuildMenu()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //first we get the DirectoryInfo for your root folder, this will be used to find the first set of sub-directoriesDi2015NewLine    DirectoryInfo dir = new DirectoryInfo(@"C:\\MyRootFolder\\");//Change thisDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //next we create the first MenuItem to represent the root folder, this is created using the GetMenuItem functionDi2015NewLine    ToolStripMenuItem root = GetMenuItem(dir);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //we add our new root MenuItem to our MenuStrip control, at this point all sub-menu items will have been added using our recursive functionDi2015NewLine    menuStrip1.Items.Add(root);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic ToolStripMenuItem GetMenuItem(DirectoryInfo directory)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //first we create the MenuItem that will be return for this directoryDi2015NewLine    ToolStripMenuItem item = new ToolStripMenuItem(directory.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //next we loop all sub-directory of the current to build all child menu itemsDi2015NewLine    foreach (DirectoryInfo dir in directory.GetDirectories())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        item.DropDownItems.Add(GetMenuItem(dir));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //finally we return the populated menu itemDi2015NewLine    return item;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10498109Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetMenuItem
10498109Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic ToolStripMenuItem GetMenuItem(DirectoryInfo directory, List<DirectoryInfo> currentFolders = null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (currentFolders == null)Di2015NewLine        currentFolders = new List<DirectoryInfo>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    currentFolders.Add(directory);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ToolStripMenuItem item = new ToolStripMenuItem(directory.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (DirectoryInfo dir in directory.GetDirectories())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!currentFolders.Any(x => x.FullName == dir.FullName))//check to see if we already processed this folder (i.e. a unwanted shortcut)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            item.DropDownItems.Add(GetMenuItem(dir, currentFolders));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return item;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10498543Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class EntityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<Type, Action> SubscribersDi2015NewLine         = new Dictionary<Type, Action>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal virtual void OnSaved()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        OnSaved(GetType());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private OnSaved(Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Action subscribed;Di2015NewLine        Subscribers.TryGetValue(type, out subscribed);Di2015NewLine        if (subscribed != null)Di2015NewLine            subscribed();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Subscribe(Type type, Action action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Action subscribed;Di2015NewLine        Subscribers.TryGetValue(type, out subscribed);Di2015NewLine        Subscribers[type] = subscribed + action;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Unsubscribe(Type type, Action action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Action subscribed;Di2015NewLine        Subscribers.TryGetValue(type, out subscribed);Di2015NewLine        Subscribers[type] = subscribed - action;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
