10499186Di2015UniqueSeparatorBoolean
10499280Di2015UniqueSeparatorAggregationType
10499280Di2015UniqueSeparatorcheckType
10499280Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate enum AggerationType { Year = 1, Month = 2, Day = 3, Hour = 4 }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate IList<Data> RunQuery(AggerationType groupType, AggerationType checkType)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The actual query which does to trickDi2015NewLine    var result =Di2015NewLine        from d in testListDi2015NewLine        group d by new {Di2015NewLine            d.Start.Year,Di2015NewLine            Month = (int)groupType >= (int)AggerationType.Month ? d.Start.Month : 1,Di2015NewLine            Day = (int)groupType >= (int)AggerationType.Day ? d.Start.Day : 1,Di2015NewLine            Hour = (int)groupType >= (int)AggerationType.Hour ? d.Start.Hour : 1Di2015NewLine        } into gDi2015NewLine        // The where clause checks how much data needs to be in the groupDi2015NewLine        where CheckAggregation(g.Count(), checkType)Di2015NewLine        select new Data() { Start = g.Min(m => m.Start), End = g.Max(m => m.End), Value = g.Sum(m => m.Value) };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result.ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate bool CheckAggregation(int groupCount, AggerationType checkType)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int requiredCount = 1;Di2015NewLine    switch(checkType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // For year all data must be multiplied by 12 monthsDi2015NewLine        case AggerationType.Year:Di2015NewLine            requiredCount = requiredCount * 12; Di2015NewLine            goto case AggerationType.Month;Di2015NewLine        // For months all data must be multiplied by days in monthDi2015NewLine        case AggerationType.Month:Di2015NewLine            // I use 30 but this depends on the given month and yearDi2015NewLine            requiredCount = requiredCount * 30; Di2015NewLine            goto case AggerationType.Day;Di2015NewLine        // For days all data need to be multiplied by 24 hourDi2015NewLine        case AggerationType.Day:Di2015NewLine            requiredCount = requiredCount * 24;Di2015NewLine            goto case AggerationType.Hour;Di2015NewLine        // For hours all data need to be multiplied by 2 (because slots of 30 minutes)Di2015NewLine        case AggerationType.Hour:Di2015NewLine            requiredCount = requiredCount * 2;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return groupCount == requiredCount;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10499280Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass DataDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public DateTime Start { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public DateTime End { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Value { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Just setup some test data simulary to your exampleDi2015NewLineIList<Data> testList = new List<Data>();Di2015NewLineDateTime date = DateTime.Parse("6:00"); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This loop fills just some data over several years, months and daysDi2015NewLinefor (int year = date.Year; year > 2010; year--)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for(int month = date.Month; month > 0; month--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int day = date.Day; day > 0; day--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for(int hour = date.Hour; hour > 0; hour--)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DateTime testDate = date.AddHours(-hour).AddDays(-day).AddMonths(-month).AddYears(-(date.Year - year));Di2015NewLine                testList.Add(new Data() { Start = testDate, End = testDate.AddMinutes(30), Value = 1 });Di2015NewLine                testList.Add(new Data() { Start = testDate.AddMinutes(30), End = testDate.AddHours(1), Value = 1 });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10499819Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void ReflectionInvoke()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int sum = 0;Di2015NewLine            int sub = 0;Di2015NewLine            int sum1 = 0;Di2015NewLine            int sum2 = 0;Di2015NewLine            MethodInfo mi = default(MethodInfo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Loading the assembly Di2015NewLine            Assembly reflectionAssemby = Assembly.LoadFile(@"C:\\RelectionDLL.dll");Di2015NewLine            // Get type of class from loaded assemblyDi2015NewLine            Type reflectionClassType = reflectionAssemby.GetType("ReflectionDLL.ReflectionClass");Di2015NewLine            // Create instance of the classDi2015NewLine            object objReflection = Activator.CreateInstance(reflectionClassType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Playing with property read/writeDi2015NewLine            PropertyInfo intPropInfo = reflectionClassType.GetProperty("intProperty");Di2015NewLine            int i = Convert.ToInt32(intPropInfo.GetValue(objReflection, null));Di2015NewLine            // Reading valueDi2015NewLine            intPropInfo.SetValue(objReflection, 55, null);Di2015NewLine            // writing valueDi2015NewLine            int k = Convert.ToInt32(intPropInfo.GetValue(objReflection, null));Di2015NewLine            // Reading valueDi2015NewLine            // Playing with property readDi2015NewLine            PropertyInfo strPropInfo = reflectionClassType.GetProperty("strProperty");Di2015NewLine            String str = (String)strPropInfo.GetValue(objReflection, null);Di2015NewLine            // Reading valueDi2015NewLine            // Playing with property writeDi2015NewLine            PropertyInfo dtPropertyInfo = reflectionClassType.GetProperty("dtProperty");Di2015NewLine            dtPropertyInfo.SetValue(objReflection, DateTime.Now, null);Di2015NewLine            // writing valueDi2015NewLine            // Playing with static property read/writeDi2015NewLine            PropertyInfo staticPropertyInfo = reflectionClassType.GetProperty("staticProperty");Di2015NewLine            int i1 = Convert.ToInt32(staticPropertyInfo.GetValue(null, null));Di2015NewLine            // Reading valueDi2015NewLine            staticPropertyInfo.SetValue(null, 111, null);Di2015NewLine            // writing valueDi2015NewLine            int k1 = Convert.ToInt32(staticPropertyInfo.GetValue(null, null));Di2015NewLine            // Reading valueDi2015NewLine            // Invoking instance methodDi2015NewLine            //Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("IInd Way to call methods");Di2015NewLine            reflectionClassType.InvokeMember("pub_Inst_NoReturn_Function", BindingFlags.InvokeMethod | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public, null, objReflection, null);Di2015NewLine            reflectionClassType.InvokeMember("pri_Inst_NoReturn_Function", BindingFlags.InvokeMethod | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic, null, objReflection, null);Di2015NewLine            sum = Convert.ToInt32(reflectionClassType.InvokeMember("pub_inst_Add_TwoNos", BindingFlags.InvokeMethod | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public, null, objReflection, new object[] { 55, 56 }));Di2015NewLine            sub = Convert.ToInt32(reflectionClassType.InvokeMember("pri_inst_Subtract_TwoNos", BindingFlags.InvokeMethod | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic, null, objReflection, new object[] { 55, 56 }));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Invoking static methodDi2015NewLine            reflectionClassType.InvokeMember("pub_static_NoReturn_Function", BindingFlags.InvokeMethod | BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public, null, null, null);Di2015NewLine            reflectionClassType.InvokeMember("pri_static_NoReturn_Function", BindingFlags.InvokeMethod | BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.NonPublic, null, null, null);Di2015NewLine            sum1 = Convert.ToInt32(reflectionClassType.InvokeMember("pub_static_Add_TwoNos", BindingFlags.InvokeMethod | BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public, null, null, new object[] { 55, 56 }));Di2015NewLine            sum2 = Convert.ToInt32(reflectionClassType.InvokeMember("pri_static_Subtract_TwoNos", BindingFlags.InvokeMethod | BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.NonPublic, null, null, new object[] { 55, 56 }));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

     {Di2015NewLine            // Grab all local interfaces to this computerDi2015NewLine            nicArr = NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Add      // Change the initial selection to the first interfaceDi2015NewLine            cmbInterface.SelectedIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Initialize the TimerDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        private void InitializeTimer()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            timer = new Timer();Di2015NewLine            timer.Interval = (int)timerUpdate;Di2015NewLine            timer.Tick += new EventHandler(timer_Tick);Di2015NewLine            timer.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine            // Grab NetworkInterface object that describes the current interfaceDi2015NewLine            NetworkInterface nic = nicArr[cmbInterface.SelectedIndex];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Grab the stats for that interfaceDi2015NewLine            IPv4InterfaceStatistics interfaceStats = nic.GetIPv4Statistics();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Calculate the speed of bytes going in and outDi2015NewLine            // NOTE: we could use something faster and more reliable than Windows Forms TiemrDi2015NewLine            //       such as HighPerformanceTimer http://www.m0interactive.com/archives/2006/12/21/high_resolution_timer_in_net_2_0.htmlDi2015NewLine            int double.Parse(lblBytesReceived.Text)) / 1024;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Update the labelsDi2015NewLine            lblSpeed.Text = nic.Speed.ToString();Di2015NewLine KB/s";Di2015NewLine            lblDownload.Text = bytesReceivedSpeed.ToString() + " KB/s";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10513545Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IEnumerable<T> ExecuteReader<T>(SqlCommand cmd, Di2015NewLine    Func<IDataRecord, T> recordCreator)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var con = GetConnection()) {Di2015NewLine        con.Open ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var tr = con.BeginTransaction()) {Di2015NewLine            cmd.Connection = con;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var reader = cmd.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLine            while (reader.Read()) {Di2015NewLine                yield return recordCreator(reader);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tr.Commit();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10513711Di2015UniqueSeparatorwhile (true)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // wait for the main thread to signal "start"Di2015NewLine    startPlayingAutoResetEvent.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine    // ensure the stopPlaying is in an unsignalled stateDi2015NewLine    stopPlayingAutoResetEvent.Reset();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // gather the data the main thread has preparedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (stepsToPlay)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // wait until main thread signals to stop OR timeout has elapsedDi2015NewLine        if (stopPlayingAutoResetEvent.WaitOne(timeout))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // abort current run and put thread in idle mode, waiting for new commandsDi2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // play next stepDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10515693Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate IEnumerable<int> constructSetFromBits(int i)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int n = 0; i != 0; i /= 2, n++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((i & 1) != 0)Di2015NewLine            yield return n;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineList<string> allValues = new List<string>()Di2015NewLine        { "A1", "A2", "A3", "B1", "B2", "C1" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate IEnumerable<List<string>> produceEnumeration()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < (1 << allValues.Count); i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield returnDi2015NewLine            constructSetFromBits(i).Select(n => allValues[n]).ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic List<List<string>> produceList()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return produceEnumeration().ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10517163Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool SendEmail()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool status = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //code to send emailDi2015NewLine            this._mail = new MailMessage();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this._mail.From = new MailAddress(this.From, this.DisplayName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (string address in distinctAddress) // Loop through all stringsDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    this.To += address + ","; // Append string to StringBuilderDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                this.To = this.To.TrimEnd(',');Di2015NewLine this._mail.CC.Add(this.CC);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(this.BCC))Di2015NewLine                this._mail.Bcc.Add(this.BCC);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this._mail.Subject = this.Subject;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this._mail.IsBodyHtml = this.IsBodyHtml;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this._mail.Body = this.Body;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (this.Priority == true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this._mail.Priority = MailPriority.High;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this._mail.DeliveryNotificationOptions = DeliveryNotificationOptions.OnFailure;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (this._attachments != null && this._attachments.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (string file in this._attachments)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Attachment attachment = new Attachment(file);Di2015NewLine                    this._mail.Attachments.Add(attachment);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     this._smtpServer.Credentials = new System.Net.NetworkCredential(this.UserId, this.Password);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(this.To) != true ||   }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    return status;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10517727Di2015UniqueSeparator[HttpPost]Di2015NewLinepublic ActionResult Update(ProductViewModel viewModel) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!ModelState.IsValid) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // The view model is invalid => redisplay the view in orderDi2015NewLine        // to show the error messagesDi2015NewLine        return View(viewModel);Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // at this stage we know that the view model is valid =>Di2015NewLine    // now we can map it to a domain model that we want to update:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Product product = Repository.GetModel(viewModel.Id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // I use AutoMapper (http://automapper.org/) to map between Di2015NewLine    // my domain models and my view models. In this exampleDi2015NewLine    // we are updating only the properties of the domain modelDi2015NewLine    // that were part of the view model and that the user is allowedDi2015NewLine    // to modify in this view => we are mergingDi2015NewLine    Mapper.Map<ProductViewModel, Product>(viewModel, product);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // now we can process the domain modelDi2015NewLine    Repository.Update(product);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return RedirectToAction("Index");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10518394Di2015UniqueSeparatorscript.pl
10518394Di2015UniqueSeparatoruse warnings;Di2015NewLineuse strict;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine## Assign empty value to read file by paragraphs.Di2015NewLine$/ = qq[];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine## Arrays to save second row of its section.Di2015NewLinemy (@adm, @prov);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine## Regex to match beginning of section.Di2015NewLinemy $regex = qr/(?:#(?|(Adm)|(Prov)))/;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine## Read file.Di2015NewLinewhile ( <> ) { Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ## Remove last '\\n'.Di2015NewLine    chomp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ## If matches the section and it has at least two lines...Di2015NewLine    if ( m/\\A${regex}/ and tr/\\n/\\n/ == 2 ) { Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ## Group the section name ($1) and its second line ($2).Di2015NewLine        if ( m/\\A${regex}.*\\n^(.*)\\Z/ms ) { Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ## Save line in an array depending of section's value.Di2015NewLine            if ( $1 eq q[Adm] ) { Di2015NewLine                push @adm, $2; Di2015NewLine            }   Di2015NewLine            elsif ( $1 eq q[Prov] ) { Di2015NewLine                push @prov, $2; Di2015NewLine            }   Di2015NewLine        }   Di2015NewLine    }   Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine## Print first lines of 'Adm' section and later lines of 'Prov' section.Di2015NewLinefor ( ( @adm, @prov ) ) { Di2015NewLine    printf qq[%s\\n], $_; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineexit 0;Di2015NewLine

10518892Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static bool IsDevicePresent(string guid)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var info = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine        var NullGuid = new Guid(guid);Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            info = SetupDiGetClassDevsW(ref NullGuid,null,IntPtr.Zero,DIGCF_PRESENT);Di2015NewLine            CheckError("SetupDiGetClassDevs");Di2015NewLine            var devdata = new SP_DEVINFO_DATA();Di2015NewLine            devdata.cbSize = (UInt32)Marshal.SizeOf(devdata);Di2015NewLine            // Get first device matching device criterion.Di2015NewLine            SetupDiEnumDeviceInfo(info,0,out devdata);Di2015NewLine            // if no items match filter, throwDi2015NewLine            if (Marshal.GetLastWin32Error() == ERROR_NO_MORE_ITEMS)Di2015NewLine                CheckError("No device found matching filter.", 0xcffff);Di2015NewLine            CheckError("SetupDiEnumDeviceInfo");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (info != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine                SetupDiDestroyDeviceInfoList(info);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void CheckError(string message, int lasterror = -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int code = lasterror == -1 ? Marshal.GetLastWin32Error() : lasterror;Di2015NewLine        if (code != 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException(String.Format("Error disabling hardware device (Code {0}): {1}",code, message));Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("setupapi.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    private static extern IntPtr SetupDiGetClassDevsW([In] ref Guid ClassGuid,[MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.LPWStr)]string Enumerator,IntPtr parent,UInt32 flags);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("setupapi.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    private static extern bool SetupDiDestroyDeviceInfoList(IntPtr handle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("setupapi.dll", SetLastError = true)]Di2015NewLine    private static extern bool SetupDiEnumDeviceInfo(IntPtr deviceInfoSet,UInt32 memberIndex,[Out] out SP_DEVINFO_DATA deviceInfoData);  Di2015NewLine    //used to find device info from device managerDi2015NewLine    [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential)]Di2015NewLine    private struct SP_DEVINFO_DATADi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public UInt32 cbSize;Di2015NewLine        public Guid classGuid;Di2015NewLine        public UInt32 devInst;Di2015NewLine        public IntPtr reserved;Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    private const uint DIGCF_PRESENT = 2;Di2015NewLine    private const uint ERROR_INVALID_DATA = 13;Di2015NewLine    private const uint ERROR_NO_MORE_ITEMS = 259;Di2015NewLine    private const uint ERROR_ELEMENT_NOT_FOUND = 1168;Di2015NewLine

10519847Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> CartesianProduct<T>(Di2015NewLine  this IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> sequences) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine  IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> emptyProduct = new[] { Enumerable.Empty<T>() }; Di2015NewLine  return sequences.Aggregate( Di2015NewLine    emptyProduct, Di2015NewLine    (accumulator, sequence) => Di2015NewLine      from accseq in accumulator Di2015NewLine      from item in sequence Di2015NewLine      select accseq.Concat(new[] {item})); Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10521124Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Image GetExternalImg(string name, string size)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get the image from the web.Di2015NewLine            WebRequest req = WebRequest.Create(String.Format("http://www.picturesite.com/picture.png", name, size));Di2015NewLine            // Read the image that we get in a stream.Di2015NewLine            Stream stream = req.GetResponse().GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine            // Save the image from the stream that we are rreading.Di2015NewLine            Image img = Image.FromStream(stream);Di2015NewLine            // Save the image to local storage.Di2015NewLine            img.Save(Environment.CurrentDirectory + "\\\\images\\\\" + name + ".png");Di2015NewLine            return img;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine              //grab an image from resourceDi2015NewLine              return theDefaultImage;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10525103Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void DeleteNode(IList<Node> nodes, Guid id)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Node nodeToDelete = null;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var node in nodes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (node.Id == id)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            nodeToDelete = node;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        DeleteNode(node.Children, id);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (nodeToDelete != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        nodes.Remove(nodeToDelete);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10525103Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void DeleteNode(IList<Node> flatNodes, Guid id)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var nodeToDelete = flatNodes.FirstOrDefault(n => n.Id == id);Di2015NewLine    if (nodeToDelete != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var parent = flatNodes.First(n => n.Id == nodeToDelete.ParentId);Di2015NewLine        parent.Children.Remove(nodeToDelete);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void DeleteNodeFromFlatDictionary(IDictionary<Guid, Node> flatNodes, Guid id)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!flatNodes.ContainsKey(id)) return;Di2015NewLine    var nodeToDelete = flatNodes[id];Di2015NewLine    parent[nodeToDelete.ParentId].Children.Remove(id);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10527155Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class IPSubnetDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly byte[] _address;Di2015NewLine    private readonly int _prefixLength;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IPSubnet(string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("value");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] parts = value.Split('/');Di2015NewLine        if (parts.Length != 2)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Invalid CIDR notation.", "value");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _address = IPAddress.Parse(parts[0]).GetAddressBytes();Di2015NewLine        _prefixLength = Convert.ToInt32(parts[1], 10);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Contains(string address)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.Contains(IPAddress.Parse(address).GetAddressBytes());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Contains(byte[] address)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (address == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("address");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (address.Length != _address.Length)Di2015NewLine            return false; // IPv4/IPv6 mismatchDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int index = 0;Di2015NewLine        int bits = _prefixLength;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (; bits >= 8; bits -= 8)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (address[index] != _address[index])Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            ++index;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (bits > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int mask = (byte)~(255 >> bits);Di2015NewLine            if ((address[index] & mask) != (_address[index] & mask))Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10537193Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Controls;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Documents;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Input;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Media;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Media.Animation;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Shapes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class RichTextBlockExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void SetLinkedText(this RichTextBlock richTextBlock, string htmlFragment)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var regEx = new Regex(Di2015NewLine            @"\\<a\\s(href\\=""|[^\\>]+?\\shref\\="")(?<link>[^""]+)"".*?\\>(?<text>.*?)(\\<\\/a\\>|$)",Di2015NewLine            RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.Multiline);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        richTextBlock.Blocks.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int nextOffset = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Match match in regEx.Matches(htmlFragment))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (match.Index > nextOffset)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                richTextBlock.AppendText(htmlFragment.Substring(nextOffset, match.Index - nextOffset));Di2015NewLine                nextOffset = match.Index + match.Length;Di2015NewLine                richTextBlock.AppendLink(match.Groups["text"].Value, new Uri(match.Groups["link"].Value));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Debug.WriteLine(match.Groups["text"] + ":" + match.Groups["link"]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (nextOffset < htmlFragment.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            richTextBlock.AppendText(htmlFragment.Substring(nextOffset));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void AppendText(this RichTextBlock richTextBlock, string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Paragraph paragraph;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (richTextBlock.Blocks.Count == 0 ||Di2015NewLine            (paragraph = richTextBlock.Blocks[richTextBlock.Blocks.Count - 1] as Paragraph) == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            paragraph = new Paragraph();Di2015NewLine            richTextBlock.Blocks.Add(paragraph);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        paragraph.Inlines.Add(new Run { Text = text });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void AppendLink(this RichTextBlock richTextBlock, string text, Uri uri)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Paragraph paragraph;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (richTextBlock.Blocks.Count == 0 ||Di2015NewLine            (paragraph = richTextBlock.Blocks[richTextBlock.Blocks.Count - 1] as Paragraph) == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            paragraph = new Paragraph();Di2015NewLine            richTextBlock.Blocks.Add(paragraph);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var run = new Run { Text = text };Di2015NewLine        var link = new Hyperlink { NavigateUri = uri };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        link.Inlines.Add(run);Di2015NewLine        paragraph.Inlines.Add(link);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic partial class MainPage : UserControlDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public MainPage()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        this.richTextBlock.SetLinkedText(Di2015NewLine            "Download it directly to the <a href=\\"http://itunes.apple.com/fi/app/goalapp/id502461189?ls=1&mt=8\\">iTunes Store</a> or <a href=\\"https://market.android.com/details?id=com.strikersoft.meramal.se\\">Android Market</a>. 10538049Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static List<Error> ParseErrors(string filepath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Regex parser = new Regex(@"^(?<date>\\w{3}\\s\\d{2}\\s\\d{1,2}(?::\\d{1,2}){2}),[^\\|]+\\|ERROR\\|[^:]+:\\s*(?<description>.+?)(?:\\.\\.\\.\\s*(?<type>.+))?$", RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.Compiled);Di2015NewLine        string line = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        Match curMatch = null;Di2015NewLine        var errorLog = new List<Error>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (StreamReader sReader = new StreamReader(filepath))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (!sReader.EndOfStream && (line = sReader.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                curMatch = parser.Match(line);Di2015NewLine                if (curMatch.Success)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    errorLog.Add(new Error()Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        ID = errorLog.Count, /* not sure how you assign ids? */Di2015NewLine                        Date = curMatch.Groups["date"].Value.Trim(),Di2015NewLine                        Description = curMatch.Groups["description"].Value.Trim(),Di2015NewLine                        ErrorType = (curMatch.Groups["type"].Success ? curMatch.Groups["type"].Value : sReader.ReadLine().Trim())Di2015NewLine                    });Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return errorLog;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

" +Di2015NewLine                                      "name=\\"media\\"; filename=\\"{0}\\"",Di2015NewLine                                      shortFileName);Di2015NewLine    var encoding = Encoding.GetEncoding("iso-8859-1");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var contents = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    contents.AppendLine(separator);Di2015NewLine    contents.AppendLine("Content-Disposition: form-data; name=\\"status\\"");Di2015NewLine    contents.AppendLine();Di2015NewLine    contents.AppendLine(item.UserMessage);Di2015NewLine    contents.AppendLine(separator);Di2015NewLine    contents.AppendLine(fileHeader);Di2015NewLine    contents.AppendLine(string.Format("Content-Type: {0}", fileContentType));Di2015NewLine    contents.AppendLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // actually send the requestDi2015NewLine    request.ServicePoint.Expect100Continue = false;Di2015NewLine    request.ContentType = "multipart/form-data; boundary=" + boundary;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var s = request.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] bytes = encoding.GetBytes(contents.ToString());Di2015NewLine        s.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine        bytes = fileData;Di2015NewLine        s.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine        bytes = encoding.GetBytes(footer);Di2015NewLine        s.Write(bytes, 0, bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var response = (HttpWebResponse) request.GetResponse())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (response.StatusCode != HttpStatusCode.OK)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception(response.StatusDescription);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10542657Di2015UniqueSeparatorA file system filter driver intercepts requests targeted at a file system or another file system filter driver. By intercepting the request before it reaches its intended target, the filter driver can extend or replace functionality provided by the original target of the request. Examples of file system filter drivers include anti-virus filters, backup agents, and encryption products.

10551670Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FlyingTextDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly List<FlyingText> FlyingTexts = new List<FlyingText>();Di2015NewLine    private readonly double fontGrow;Di2015NewLine    private readonly string text;Di2015NewLine    private System.Windows.Point center;Di2015NewLine    private System.Windows.Media.Brush brush;Di2015NewLine    private double fontSize;Di2015NewLine    private double alpha;Di2015NewLine    private Label label;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public FlyingText(string s, double size, System.Windows.Point center)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.text = s;Di2015NewLine        this.fontSize = Math.Max(1, size);Di2015NewLine        this.fontGrow = Math.Sqrt(size) * 0.4;Di2015NewLine        this.center = center;Di2015NewLine        this.alpha = 1.0;Di2015NewLine        this.label = null;Di2015NewLine        this.brush = null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void NewFlyingText(double size, System.Windows.Point center, string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FlyingTexts.Add(new FlyingText(s, size, center));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Draw(UIElementCollection children)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < FlyingTexts.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FlyingText flyout = FlyingTexts[i];Di2015NewLine            if (flyout.alpha <= 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                FlyingTexts.Remove(flyout);Di2015NewLine                i--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var flyout in FlyingTexts)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            flyout.Advance();Di2015NewLine            children.Add(flyout.label);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Advance()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.alpha -= 0.01;Di2015NewLine        if (this.alpha < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.alpha = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (this.brush == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.brush = new SolidColorBrush(System.Windows.Media.Color.FromArgb(255, 255, 255, 255));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (this.label == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.brush.Opacity = Math.Pow(this.alpha, 1.5);Di2015NewLine        this.label.Foreground = this.brush;Di2015NewLine        this.fontSize += this.fontGrow;Di2015NewLine        this.label.FontSize = Math.Max(1, this.fontSize);Di2015NewLine        Rect renderRect = new Rect(this.label.RenderSize);Di2015NewLine        this.label.SetValue(Canvas.LeftProperty, this.center.X - (renderRect.Width / 2));Di2015NewLine        this.label.SetValue(Canvas.TopProperty, this.center.Y - (renderRect.Height / 2));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10553049Di2015UniqueSeparatorBigInteger
10553049Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static BigInteger NextPalindrome(BigInteger input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string firstHalf=input.ToString().Substring(0,(input.ToString().Length+1)/2);Di2015NewLine    string incrementedFirstHalf=(BigInteger.Parse(firstHalf)+1).ToString();Di2015NewLine    var candidates=new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    candidates.Add(firstHalf+new String(firstHalf.Reverse().ToArray()));Di2015NewLine    candidates.Add(firstHalf+new String(firstHalf.Reverse().Skip(1).ToArray()));Di2015NewLine    candidates.Add(incrementedFirstHalf+new String(incrementedFirstHalf.Reverse().ToArray()));Di2015NewLine    candidates.Add(incrementedFirstHalf+new String(incrementedFirstHalf.Reverse().Skip(1).ToArray()));Di2015NewLine    candidates.Add("1"+new String('0',input.ToString().Length-1)+"1");Di2015NewLine    return candidates.Select(s=>BigInteger.Parse(s))Di2015NewLine              .Where(i=>i>input)Di2015NewLine              .OrderBy(i=>i)Di2015NewLine              .First();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10553495Di2015UniqueSeparator1) Is this a postback?Di2015NewLine   -> No: Generate a new value and store it in ViewState. Hold onto this value.Di2015NewLine   -> Yes: Do we have a stored answer value in ViewState?Di2015NewLine         -> No: Error? Something has gone wrong.Di2015NewLine         -> Yes: Fetch that Value and hold on to itDi2015NewLine2) On Button Click, Is the answer you entered the same as the generated value?Di2015NewLine   -> No: Show ErrorDi2015NewLine   -> Yes: Show Success, Then generate a new value and store it in ViewStateDi2015NewLine

10556696Di2015UniqueSeparatorHashAlgorithm hashAlgorithm = new SHA256Managed();Di2015NewLineHashSet<string> hashSet = new HashSet<string>();Di2015NewLinestring tempFilePath = filepath + ".tmp";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing (var fs = new FileStream(tempFilePath, FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write))Di2015NewLineusing (var sw = new StreamWriter(fs))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (string line in File.ReadLines(filepath))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] lineBytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(line);Di2015NewLine        byte[] hashBytes = hashAlgorithm.ComputeHash(lineBytes);Di2015NewLine        string hash = Convert.ToBase64String(hashBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (hashSet.Add(hash))Di2015NewLine            sw.WriteLine(line);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFile.Delete(filepath);Di2015NewLineFile.Move(tempFilePath, filepath);Di2015NewLine

10556942Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void ReadExcelFileSAX(string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  using (SpreadsheetDocument spreadsheetDocument = Di2015NewLine                                   SpreadsheetDocument.Open(fileName, true))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    WorkbookPart workbookPart = spreadsheetDocument.WorkbookPart;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Iterate through all WorksheetPartsDi2015NewLine    foreach (WorksheetPart worksheetPart in workbookPart.WorksheetParts)Di2015NewLine    {          Di2015NewLine      OpenXmlPartReader reader = new OpenXmlPartReader(worksheetPart);Di2015NewLine      string text;Di2015NewLine      string rowNum;Di2015NewLine      while (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        if (reader.ElementType == typeof(Row))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          doDi2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            if (reader.HasAttributes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine              rowNum = reader.Attributes.First(a => a.LocalName == "r").Value;Di2015NewLine              Console.Write("rowNum: " + rowNum);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          } while (reader.ReadNextSibling()); // Skip to the next rowDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          break; // We just looped through all the rows so no Di2015NewLine                 // need to continue reading the worksheetDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (reader.ElementType != typeof(Worksheet))Di2015NewLine          reader.Skip(); Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      reader.Close();      Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }  Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10556942Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void ReadAllCellValues(string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  using (SpreadsheetDocument spreadsheetDocument = SpreadsheetDocument.Open(fileName, false))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    WorkbookPart workbookPart = spreadsheetDocument.WorkbookPart;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach(WorksheetPart worksheetPart in workbookPart.WorksheetParts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      OpenXmlReader reader = OpenXmlReader.Create(worksheetPart);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      while (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        if (reader.ElementType == typeof(Row))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          reader.ReadFirstChild();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          doDi2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            if (reader.ElementType == typeof(Cell))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine              Cell c = (Cell)reader.LoadCurrentElement();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              string cellValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              if (c.DataType != null && c.DataType == CellValues.SharedString)Di2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                SharedStringItem ssi = workbookPart.SharedStringTablePart.SharedStringTable.Elements<SharedStringItem>().ElementAt(int.Parse(c.CellValue.InnerText));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                cellValue = ssi.Text.Text;Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLine              elseDi2015NewLine              {Di2015NewLine                cellValue = c.CellValue.InnerText;Di2015NewLine              }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              Console.Out.Write("{0}: {1} ", c.CellReference, cellValue);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine          } while (reader.ReadNextSibling());Di2015NewLine          Console.Out.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        }            Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }   Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10558538Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IHtmlString DictionaryEditorFor<TModel, TProperty, TKey, TValue>(this HtmlHelper<TModel> Html, Expression<Func<TModel, TProperty>> expression, IDictionary<TKey, TValue> dictionary, DictionaryIndexRetrievalCounter<TKey, TValue> counter, string templateName, object additionalViewData)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string hiddenKey = Html.HiddenFor(expression).ToHtmlString();Di2015NewLine    string editorValue = Html.EditorFor(expression, templateName, additionalViewData).ToHtmlString();Di2015NewLine    string expText = ExpressionHelper.GetExpressionText(expression);Di2015NewLine    string indexText = expText.Substring(expText.IndexOf('[')).Replace("[", string.Empty).Replace("]", string.Empty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    KeyValuePair<TKey, TValue> item = dictionary.SingleOrDefault(p => p.Key.ToString() == indexText);Di2015NewLine    int index = counter.GetIndex(item.Key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string key = hiddenKey.Replace("[" + indexText + "]", "[" + index + "].Key").Replace("value=\\"" + item.Value + "\\"", "value=\\"" + item.Key + "\\"");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string value = editorValue.Replace("[" + indexText + "]", "[" + index + "].Value");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new HtmlString(key + value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10558538Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DictionaryIndexRetrievalCounter<TKey, TValue>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private IDictionary<TKey, TValue> _dictionary;Di2015NewLine    private IList<TKey> _retrievedKeys;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DictionaryIndexRetrievalCounter(IDictionary<TKey, TValue> dictionary)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this._dictionary = dictionary;Di2015NewLine        this._retrievedKeys = new List<TKey>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetIndex(TKey key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!_retrievedKeys.Contains(key))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _retrievedKeys.Add(key);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _retrievedKeys.IndexOf(key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public class MyHtmlAwareFormatter : IDispatchMessageFormatterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IDispatchMessageFormatter original;Di2015NewLine        public MyHtmlAwareFormatter(IDispatchMessageFormatter original)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.original = original;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void DeserializeRequest(Message message, object[] parameters)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.original.DeserializeRequest(message, parameters);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Message SerializeReply(MessageVersion messageVersion, object[] parameters, object result)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MyUseHtmlExtension useHtml = OperationContext.Current.Extensions.Find<MyUseHtmlExtension>();Di2015NewLine            if (useHtml != null && useHtml.UseHtmlResponse)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine                sb.AppendLine("<html><head><title>Result of " + useHtml.OperationName + "</title></head>");Di2015NewLine                sb.AppendLine("<body><h1>Result of " + useHtml.OperationName + "</h1>");Di2015NewLine                sb.AppendLine("<p><b>" + result.GetType().FullName + "</b></p>");Di2015NewLine                sb.AppendLine("<ul>");Di2015NewLine                foreach (var prop in result.GetType().GetProperties())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string line = string.Format("{0}: {1}", prop.Name, prop.GetValue(result, null));Di2015NewLine                    sb.AppendLine("<li>" + line + "</li>");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                sb.AppendLine("</ul></body></html>");Di2015NewLine                byte[] bytes = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(sb.ToString());Di2015NewLine                Message reply = Message.CreateMessage(messageVersion, null, new RawBodyWriter(bytes));Di2015NewLine                reply.Properties.Add(WebBodyFormatMessageProperty.Name, new WebBodyFormatMessageProperty(WebContentFormat.Raw));Di2015NewLine                HttpResponseMessageProperty httpResp = new HttpResponseMessageProperty();Di2015NewLine                reply.Properties.Add(HttpResponseMessageProperty.Name, httpResp);Di2015NewLine                httpResp.Headers[HttpResponseHeader.ContentType] = "text/html";Di2015NewLine                return reply;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return original.SerializeReply(messageVersion, parameters, result);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        class RawBodyWriter : BodyWriterDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            private byte[] bytes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public RawBodyWriter(byte[] bytes)Di2015NewLine                : base(true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.bytes = bytes;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            protected override void OnWriteBodyContents(XmlDictionaryWriter writer)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteStartElement("Binary");Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteBase64(this.bytes, 0, this.bytes.Length);Di2015NewLine                writer.WriteEndElement();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public class MyHtmlAwareInspector : IDispatchMessageInspectorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public object AfterReceiveRequest(ref Message request, IClientChannel channel, InstanceContext instanceContext)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HttpRequestMessageProperty httpRequest = (HttpRequestMessageProperty)request.Properties[HttpRequestMessageProperty.Name];Di2015NewLine            string accept = httpRequest.Headers[HttpRequestHeader.Accept];Di2015NewLine            string operationName = request.Properties[WebHttpDispatchOperationSelector.HttpOperationNamePropertyName] as string;Di2015NewLine            if (accept == "text/html")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                OperationContext.Current.Extensions.Add(new MyUseHtmlExtension { UseHtmlResponse = true, OperationName = operationName });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void BeforeSendReply(ref Message reply, object correlationState)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    class MyUseHtmlExtension : IExtension<OperationContext>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public void Attach(OperationContext owner) { }Di2015NewLine        public void Detach(OperationContext owner) { }Di2015NewLine        public bool UseHtmlResponse { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string OperationName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public    endpointDispatcher.DispatchRuntime.MessageInspectors.Add(new MyHtmlAwareInspector());Di2015NewLine            foreach (DispatchOperation operation in endpointDispatcher.DispatchRuntime.Operations)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                operation.Formatter = new MyHtmlAwareFormatter(operation.Formatter);Di2015NewLine 10565573Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void UpdateText(Label label, string text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // If the current thread is not the UI thread, InvokeRequired will be trueDi2015NewLine    if (label.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If so, call Invoke, passing it a lambda expression which callsDi2015NewLine        // UpdateText with the same label and text, but on the UI thread instead.Di2015NewLine        label.Invoke((Action)(() => UpdateText(label, text)));Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // If we're running on the UI thread, we'll get here, and can safely update Di2015NewLine    // the label's text.Di2015NewLine    label.Text = text;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10566009Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class WrittenNumericsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static readonly string[] ones = new string[] { "", "One", "Two", "Three", "Four", "Five", "Six", "Seven", "Eight", "Nine" };Di2015NewLine    static readonly string[] teens = new string[] { "Ten", "Eleven", "Twelve", "Thirteen", "Fourteen", "Fifteen", "Sixteen", "Seventeen", "Eighteen", "Nineteen" };Di2015NewLine    static readonly string[] tens = new string[] { "Twenty", "Thirty", "Forty", "Fifty", "Sixty", "Seventy", "Eighty", "Ninety" };Di2015NewLine    static readonly string[] thousandsGroups = { "", " Thousand", " Million", " Billion" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string FriendlyInteger(int n, string leftDigits, int thousands)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (n == 0)Di2015NewLine            return leftDigits;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string friendlyInt = leftDigits;Di2015NewLine        if (friendlyInt.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            friendlyInt += " ";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (n < 10)Di2015NewLine            friendlyInt += ones[n];Di2015NewLine        else if (n < 20)Di2015NewLine            friendlyInt += teens[n - 10];Di2015NewLine        else if (n < 100)Di2015NewLine            friendlyInt += FriendlyInteger(n % 10, tens[n / 10 - 2], 0);Di2015NewLine        else if (n < 1000)Di2015NewLine            friendlyInt += FriendlyInteger(n % 100, (ones[n / 100] + " Hundred"), 0);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            friendlyInt += FriendlyInteger(n % 1000, FriendlyInteger(n / 1000, "", thousands + 1), 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return friendlyInt + thousandsGroups[thousands];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string DateToWritten(DateTime date)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return string.Format("{0} {1} {2}", IntegerToWritten(date.Day), date.ToString("MMMM"), IntegerToWritten(date.Year));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string IntegerToWritten(int n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (n == 0)Di2015NewLine            return "Zero";Di2015NewLine        else if (n < 0)Di2015NewLine            return "Negative " + IntegerToWritten(-n);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return FriendlyInteger(n, "", 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10569307Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected class Differences : Dictionary<object, RowDifferences>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected class RowDifferences : Dictionary<string, Tuple<object, object>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected Differences GetDifferences(DataTable table1,Di2015NewLine                                     DataTable table2,Di2015NewLine                                     out IEnumerable<object> onlyIn1,Di2015NewLine                                     out IEnumerable<object> onlyIn2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var arr1 = new DataRow[table1.Rows.Count];Di2015NewLine    var arr2 = new DataRow[table2.Rows.Count];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    table1.Rows.CopyTo(arr1, 0);Di2015NewLine    table2.Rows.CopyTo(arr2, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    onlyIn1 = arr1.Where(x1 => arr2.All(x2 => x1[0] != x2[0])).Select(dr => dr[0]);Di2015NewLine    onlyIn2 = arr2.Where(x1 => arr1.All(x2 => x1[0] != x2[0])).Select(dr => dr[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var differences = new Differences();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var x1 in arr1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var x2 in arr2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (x1[0] == x2[0])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var rowDifferences = new RowDifferences();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (var i = 1; i < x1.ItemArray.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (x1.ItemArray[i] != x2.ItemArray[i])Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        rowDifferences.Add(table1.Columns[i].ColumnName,Di2015NewLine                                           new Tuple<object, object>(x1.ItemArray[i], x2.ItemArray[i]));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                differences.Add(x1[0], rowDifferences);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return differences;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected void GenerateTables(out DataTable table1, out DataTable table2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    table1 = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine    table2 = new DataTable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    table1.Columns.Add("Name");Di2015NewLine    table1.Columns.Add("Balance");Di2015NewLine    table1.Columns.Add("Description");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    table2.Columns.Add("Name");Di2015NewLine    table2.Columns.Add("Balance");Di2015NewLine    table2.Columns.Add("Description");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    table1.Rows.Add("Smith", 1200, "Smith owes 600");Di2015NewLine    table1.Rows.Add("Jordan", 4000, "Hi Jordan");Di2015NewLine    table1.Rows.Add("Brooks", 5000, "I like my cat");Di2015NewLine    table1.Rows.Add("Navaro", 6000, "description here");Di2015NewLine    table1.Rows.Add("Gates", 9010, "omg");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    table2.Rows.Add("Smith", 1600, "Smith owes 600");Di2015NewLine    table2.Rows.Add("Jordan", 4200, "I'M JORDAN");Di2015NewLine    table2.Rows.Add("Clay", 9000, "Test description");Di2015NewLine    table2.Rows.Add("Brooks", 5000, "I like my cat");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10570482Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Fill(this Stream stream, byte value, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var buffer = new byte[64];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < buffer.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        buffer[i] = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    while (count > buffer.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        stream.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        count -= buffer.Length;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    stream.Write(buffer, 0, count);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

on this property - THIS should be the only real error that gets returned back to the viewDi2015NewLine            ModelState.AddModelError("", "Error on First Name");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(model.EmailAddress == null) // Add an INFO messageDi2015NewLine                ModelState.AddModelError("", "Email Address Info");Di2015NewLine            if (model.Username == null) // Add another INFO messageDi2015NewLine                ModelState.AddModelError("", "Username Info");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get the Real error off the ModelStateDi2015NewLine modelValue in ModelState.Values) {Di2015NewLine                modelValue.Errors.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // Add the real errors back on to the {Di2015NewLine            var errorMessages = new List<ModelError>() ;Di2015NewLine            foreach (var keyValuePair in modelStateDictionary) {Di2015NewLine                if (keyValuePair.Value.Errors.Count > 0) {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var error in keyValuePair.Value.Errors) {Di2015NewLine                        if (!error.ErrorMessage.Contains("Info"))       }Di2015NewLine            return errorMessages;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10571919Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate IEnumerable<ModelError> GetRealErrors(IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<string, ModelState>> modelStateDictionary) {Di2015NewLine    var errorMessages = new List<ModelError>() ;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var keyValuePair in modelStateDictionary.Where(keyValuePair => keyValuePair.Value.Errors.Count > 0)) {Di2015NewLine        errorMessages.AddRange(keyValuePair.Value.Errors.Where(error => !error.ErrorMessage.Contains("Info")));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return errorMessages;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10572109Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class ContiguousDataValueDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int UpperInt { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int LowerInt { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "Upper" + UpperInt + " Lower" + LowerInt; Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ContiguousData Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    LinkedList<ContiguousDataValue> ranges = new LinkedList<ContiguousDataValue>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void AddValue(int val)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (LinkedListNode<ContiguousDataValue> range = ranges.Last; range != null; range = range.Previous)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (val > range.Value.UpperInt)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // increment current node if applicable Di2015NewLine                if (val == range.Value.UpperInt + 1)Di2015NewLine                    range.Value.UpperInt = val;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    ranges.AddAfter(range, new ContiguousDataValue() { UpperInt = val, LowerInt = val });Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (val < range.Value.LowerInt)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (val == range.Value.LowerInt - 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    range.Value.LowerInt = val;Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Anything that reaches this line is either a very new low value, or the first entryDi2015NewLine        ranges.AddLast(new ContiguousDataValue() { UpperInt = val, LowerInt = val });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine
10572166Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<string> Normalize(string fileName, int size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<string> result = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    int blanks = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var line in File.ReadAllLines(fileName))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (line.Trim() == "")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (blanks++ < size)Di2015NewLine                result.Add("");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            blanks = 0;Di2015NewLine            results.Add(line);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return line;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10572335Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid PrintAccessRules(string path)Di2015NewLine{   Di2015NewLine    var security = File.GetAccessControl(path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var accessRules = security.GetAccessRules(true, true, typeof(NTAccount));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var rule in accessRules.Cast<FileSystemAccessRule>())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!rule.IsInherited)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0} {1} to {2} was set on {3}.", rule.AccessControlType, rule.FileSystemRights, rule.IdentityReference, path);Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        FindInheritedFrom(rule, Directory.GetParent(path).FullName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid FindInheritedFrom(FileSystemAccessRule rule, string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var security = File.GetAccessControl(path);Di2015NewLine    var accessRules = security.GetAccessRules(true, true, typeof(NTAccount));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var matching = accessRules.OfType<FileSystemAccessRule>()Di2015NewLine        .FirstOrDefault(r => r.AccessControlType == rule.AccessControlType && r.FileSystemRights == rule.FileSystemRights && r.IdentityReference == rule.IdentityReference);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (matching != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (matching.IsInherited) FindInheritedFrom(rule, Directory.GetParent(path).FullName);Di2015NewLine        else Console.WriteLine("{0} {1} to {2} is inherited from {3}", rule.AccessControlType, rule.FileSystemRights, rule.IdentityReference, path);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10575270Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic Color dominantColor(Bitmap img)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Hashtable colorCount = new Hashtable();Di2015NewLine    int maxCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    Color dominantColor = Color.White;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < img.Width; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < img.Height; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var color = img.GetPixel(i, j);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (color.A == 0)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // ignore whiteDi2015NewLine            if (color.Equals(Color.White))Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (colorCount[color] != null)Di2015NewLine                colorCount[color] = (int)colorCount[color] + 1;Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                colorCount.Add(color, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // keep track of the color that appears the most timesDi2015NewLine            if ((int)colorCount[color] > maxCount)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                maxCount = (int)colorCount[color];Di2015NewLine                dominantColor = color;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return dominantColor;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10580489Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing DiscUtils;Di2015NewLineusing DiscUtils.Iso9660;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid ExtractISO(string ISOName, string ExtractionPath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (FileStream ISOStream = File.Open(ISOName, FileMode.Open))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CDReader Reader = new CDReader(ISOStream, true, true);Di2015NewLine        ExtractDirectory(Reader.Root, ExtractionPath + Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ISOName) + "\\\\", "");Di2015NewLine        Reader.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinevoid ExtractDirectory(DiscDirectoryInfo Dinfo, string RootPath, string PathinISO)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(PathinISO))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PathinISO += "\\\\" + Dinfo.Name;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    RootPath += "\\\\" + Dinfo.Name;Di2015NewLine    AppendDirectory(RootPath);Di2015NewLine    foreach (DiscDirectoryInfo dinfo in Dinfo.GetDirectories())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ExtractDirectory(dinfo, RootPath, PathinISO);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach (DiscFileInfo finfo in Dinfo.GetFiles())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine            using (Stream FileStr = finfo.OpenRead())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (FileStream Fs = File.Create(RootPath + "\\\\" + finfo.Name)) // Here you can Set the BufferSize Also e.g. File.Create(RootPath + "\\\\" + finfo.Name, 4 * 1024)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    FileStr.CopyTo(Fs, 4 * 1024); // Buffer Size is 4 * 1024 but you can modify it in your code as per your needDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinestatic void AppendDirectory(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!Directory.Exists(path))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Directory.CreateDirectory(path);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (DirectoryNotFoundException Ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AppendDirectory(Path.GetDirectoryName(path));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (PathTooLongException Exx)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AppendDirectory(Path.GetDirectoryName(path));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10583287Di2015UniqueSeparator        int distArraySize = (pointsArray.Length * (pointsArray.Length - 1)) / 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var distanceArray = new double[distArraySize];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int numPoints = pointsArray.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Parallel.ForEach<int>(Enumerable.Range(0, numPoints - 2),Di2015NewLine            currentPointIndex =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Parallel.ForEach<int>(Enumerable.Range(currentPointIndex + 1, numPoints - 2),Di2015NewLine                    otherPointIndex =>Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        double xDistance = pointsArray[otherPointIndex].X - pointsArray[currentPointIndex].X;Di2015NewLine                        double yDistance = pointsArray[otherPointIndex].Y - pointsArray[currentPointIndex].Y;Di2015NewLine                        double distance = Math.Sqrt(xDistance * xDistance + yDistance * yDistance);Di2015NewLine                        int distanceArrayIndex = currentPointIndex * numPoints - (currentPointIndex * (currentPointIndex + 1) / 2) + otherPointIndex - 1;Di2015NewLine                        distanceArray[distanceArrayIndex] = distance;Di2015NewLine                    });Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine

10583386Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool AtLeast<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, int count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Optimization for ICollection<T>Di2015NewLine    var genericCollection = source as ICollection<T>;Di2015NewLine    if (genericCollection != null)Di2015NewLine        return genericCollection.Count >= count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Optimization for ICollectionDi2015NewLine    var collection = source as ICollection;Di2015NewLine    if (collection != null)Di2015NewLine        return collection.Count >= count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // General caseDi2015NewLine    using (var en = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int n = 0;Di2015NewLine        while (n < count && en.MoveNext()) n++;Di2015NewLine        return n == count;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10591872Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar kw = new KeywordWatcherStreamWrapper(Console.Out, "Hello");Di2015NewLinekw.KeywordFound += (s, e) => { throw new Exception("Keyword found!"); };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetry {   Di2015NewLine    Console.SetOut(kw);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Testing");Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Hel");Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("lo");Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Hello");Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Final");Di2015NewLine} catch (Exception ex) { Console.Write(ex.Message); }Di2015NewLine

10592065Di2015UniqueSeparatorDataSet

10592065Di2015UniqueSeparatorTEXT

10592065Di2015UniqueSeparator    // Structures used for conversion between data-types.Di2015NewLine    private struct ExcelDataTypesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public const string NUMBER = "NUMBER";Di2015NewLine        public const string DATETIME = "DATETIME";Di2015NewLine        public const string TEXT = "TEXT"; // also works with "STRING".Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private struct NETDataTypesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public const string SHORT = "int16";Di2015NewLine        public const string INT = "int32";Di2015NewLine        public const string LONG = "int64";Di2015NewLine        public const string STRING = "string";Di2015NewLine        public const string DATE = "DateTime";Di2015NewLine        public const string BOOL = "Boolean";Di2015NewLine        public const string DECIMAL = "decimal";Di2015NewLine        public const string DOUBLE = "double";Di2015NewLine        public const string FLOAT = "float";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Routine to export a given DataSet to Excel. For each DataTable contained Di2015NewLine    /// in the DataSet the overloaded routine will create a new Excel sheet based Di2015NewLine    /// upon the currently selected DataTable. The proceedure loops through all Di2015NewLine    /// DataRows in the selected DataTable and pushes each one to the specified Di2015NewLine    /// Excel file using ADO.NET and the Access Database Engine (Excel is not a Di2015NewLine    /// prerequisit).Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="dataSet">The DataSet to be written to Excel.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="connectionString">The connection string.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="fileName">The Excel file name to export to.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="deleteExistFile">Delete existing file?</param>Di2015NewLine    public static void ExportToExcelOleDb(DataSet dataSet, string connectionString, Di2015NewLine                                                      string fileName, bool deleteExistFile)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Support for existing file overwrite.Di2015NewLine        if (deleteExistFile && File.Exists(fileName))Di2015NewLine            File.Delete(fileName);Di2015NewLine        ExportToExcelOleDb(dataSet, connectionString, fileName);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Overloaded version of the above.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="dataSet">The DataSet to be written to Excel.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="connectionString">The SqlConnection string.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="fileName">The Excel file name to export to.</param>Di2015NewLine    public static bool ExportToExcelOleDb(DataSet dataSet, string connectionString, string fileName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Check for null set.Di2015NewLine            if (dataSet != null && dataSet.Tables.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (OleDbConnection connection = new OleDbConnection(String.Format(connectionString, fileName)))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Initialise SqlCommand and open.Di2015NewLine                    OleDbCommand command = null;Di2015NewLine                    connection.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Loop through DataTables.Di2015NewLine                    foreach (DataTable dt in dataSet.Tables)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Build the Excel create table command.Di2015NewLine                        string strCreateTableStruct = BuildCreateTableCommand(dt);Di2015NewLine                        if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(strCreateTableStruct))Di2015NewLine                            return false;Di2015NewLine                        command = new OleDbCommand(strCreateTableStruct, connection);Di2015NewLine                        command.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Puch each row into Excel.Di2015NewLine                        for (int rowIndex = 0; rowIndex < dt.Rows.Count; rowIndex++)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            command = new OleDbCommand(BuildInsertCommand(dt, rowIndex), connection);Di2015NewLine                            command.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception eX)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Utils.ErrMsg(eX.Message);Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Build the various sheet names to be inserted based upon the Di2015NewLine    /// number of DataTable provided in the DataSet. This is not requiredDi2015NewLine    /// for XCost purposes. Coded for completion.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="connectionString">The connection string.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>String array of sheet names.</returns>Di2015NewLine    private static string[] BuildExcelSheetNames(string connectionString)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Variables.Di2015NewLine        DataTable dt = null;Di2015NewLine        string[] excelSheets = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (OleDbConnection schemaConn = new OleDbConnection(connectionString))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            schemaConn.Open();Di2015NewLine            dt = schemaConn.GetOleDbSchemaTable(OleDbSchemaGuid.Tables, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // No schema found.Di2015NewLine            if (dt == null)Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Insert 'TABLE_NAME' to sheet name array.Di2015NewLine            int i = 0;Di2015NewLine            excelSheets = new string[dt.Rows.Count];Di2015NewLine            foreach (DataRow row in dt.Rows)Di2015NewLine                excelSheets[i++] = row["TABLE_NAME"].ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return excelSheets;     Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Routine to build the CREATE TABLE command. The conversion of Di2015NewLine    /// .NET to Excel data types is also handled here (supposedly!). Di2015NewLine    /// Help: http://support.microsoft.com/kb/316934/en-us.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="dataTable"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The CREATE TABLE command string.</returns>Di2015NewLine    private static string BuildCreateTableCommand(DataTable dataTable)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Get the type look-up tables.Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<string, string> dataTypeList = BuildExcelDataTypes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check for null data set.Di2015NewLine        if (dataTable.Columns.Count <= 0)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Start the command build.Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendFormat("CREATE TABLE [{0}] (", BuildExcelSheetName(dataTable));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Build column names and types.Di2015NewLine        foreach (DataColumn col in dataTable.Columns)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string type = ExcelDataTypes.TEXT;Di2015NewLine            if (dataTypeList.ContainsKey(col.DataType.Name.ToString().ToLower()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                type = dataTypeList[col.DataType.Name.ToString().ToLower()];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            sb.AppendFormat("[{0}] {1},", col.Caption.Replace(' ', '_'), type);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sb = sb.Replace(',', ')', sb.ToString().LastIndexOf(','), 1);Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();   Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Routine to construct the INSERT INTO command. This does not currently Di2015NewLine    /// work with the data type miss matches.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="dataTable"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="rowIndex"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private static string BuildInsertCommand(DataTable dataTable, int rowIndex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Remove whitespace.Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendFormat("INSERT INTO [{0}$](", BuildExcelSheetName(dataTable));Di2015NewLine        foreach (DataColumn col in dataTable.Columns)Di2015NewLine            sb.AppendFormat("[{0}],", col.Caption.Replace(' ', '_'));Di2015NewLine        sb = sb.Replace(',', ')', sb.ToString().LastIndexOf(','), 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Write values.Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("VALUES (");Di2015NewLine        foreach (DataColumn col in dataTable.Columns)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string type = col.DataType.ToString();Di2015NewLine            string strToInsert = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine            strToInsert = dataTable.Rows[rowIndex][col].ToString().Replace("'", "''");Di2015NewLine            sb.AppendFormat("'{0}',", strToInsert);Di2015NewLine            //strToInsert = String.IsNullOrEmpty(strToInsert) ? "NULL" : strToInsert;Di2015NewLine            //String.IsNullOrEmpty(strToInsert) ? "NULL" : strToInsert);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sb = sb.Replace(',', ')', sb.ToString().LastIndexOf(','), 1);Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Build the Excel sheet name.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="dataTable"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private static string BuildExcelSheetName(DataTable dataTable)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string retVal = dataTable.TableName;Di2015NewLine        if (dataTable.ExtendedProperties.ContainsKey(TABLE_NAME_PROPERTY))Di2015NewLine            retVal = dataTable.ExtendedProperties[TABLE_NAME_PROPERTY].ToString();Di2015NewLine        return retVal.Replace(' ', '_');Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
